review_text: Our family loved our stay at Casa Little Bird! The place was clean, we loved all the little rooms and places to spread out, the amenities were clean and easy to use, and the decor was so beautiful. We could tell that a lot of love and care had been poured into all of the details of that sweet little house, and we can't wait to stay there again! Thank you, Savanna!
Great little house in a beautiful location!
What a great place and host - would love to stay here again when we visit Los Alamos!
Such a lovely place and very conveniently located. We would definitely stay here again and we highly recommend it!
Charming cottage like home. Very clean. Thank you

We were in town for a family memorial service, and the home was easy to find, quiet, sunny, and clean. It was just what we needed. I also have food allergies, and the kitchen had all the pots/pans/plates I needed, as well as some olive oil/salt/pepper for cooking. It was close to our relative’s home, and we would stay there again in a heartbeat. Thank you for a lovely stay!
perfect. No complaints at all. Highly recommended!

Lots of great things here:
Nice Coffee maker plenty of filters
Plenty of Towels & Blankets
Blinds that blocked window drafts
Good internet signal
Two seating areas kitchen & living rooms
Well equipped - provisions, coffee & filters, sugar paper goods (you name it)
Location excellent
Fireplace in living room and mini split in kitchen area very nice
Chest in back bedroom
Doors, locks security excellent
Washer and dryer excellent
Desk in back bedroom has excellent pullout AC plugs
Excellent off street parking
Decorative porch lights on front porch made the casita welcoming & easy to find and to see the walkway at night.
Hot water boiler in kitchen very useful
Nice quiet neighborhood
Entire house for our own use & nicely renovated
We had a great stay! Perfect amount of space for our family.
very clean

The house was great for my family of six. 15, 12, 9, & 7 year old kids. Great base camp for exploring the area. We skied at Pajarito Mountain, roughly 10 minute drive, for three days and checked out Bandalier one afternoon. Convenient to groceries and restaurants. House had very modern touches to a mid 20th century style structure. Great views and I would definitely consider staying here again.

One of the best-appointed AirBnBs we have stayed at recently. All of the essentials provided, well-appointed kitchen, paper products, etc. It is always a bit annoying when you have to go to the store to backfill that stuff mid-trip and Savanna’s place was very well set up with everything one would need. We will be back. Thank you!
Savanna's place is a cute little house very close to the center of town. We liked how fast and easy it was to get to downtown. We also enjoyed the hiking trails we could walk to from her front door.
Cozy place with everything we needed for a ski getaway. Easy access to Pajarito and just a few minutes from city center.
A great location to ski at Pajarito and visit the local restaurants and breweries. The hosts were responsive and kind.
Great little house. Equipped with everything you could need and close to all that Los Alamos has to offer. Hosts were friendly and responsive.
Savanna's place was a nice home base for activities around Los Alamos. Homely in a quiet neighboorhood. Was easy to find and a great deal too! Will try and come back again.

This was a fabulous small place to stay with everything you need.
A very short drive to everything in town. Well equipped and most important for me it was free of fragrances in the cleaning products. A peaceful place to hang out.
The hosts were attentive, friendly and helpful.
I would go back whenever possible.

Home was centrally located and was just as described. Very easy to get inside and having extra blankets was a nice touch. Worked well with our dog, as yard is fully enclosed. Would stay again if we were to go back to Los Alamos.
Couzy, comfortable, clean and in a quite part of town.
This was an excellent experience. Thanks!
Everything was as advertised. Great spot, close to everything. Will look to book again next year.

Savanna's house was clean and just as pictured. We cooked a couple of meals during our stay and the kitchen had everything we needed. We didn't have any issues and would stay here again in the future.

Savannah was flexible about our check in time, and she responded quickly when we texted her with that question.
(We had arrived to the area a couple of hours early and didn’t want to leave our full car unattended.)
Instructions and checkout expectations were clearly communicated.
We had a wonderful stay in Los Alamos. Communication was prompt, clear, complete. Perfect accommodations for our long weekend. We’d all return in a minute.
This is a great home in a great location! Hope to return soon and will definitely rebook here.

Great location! Great communication!
Los Alamos is beautiful. The house was perfect. Thank you!

Our stay at Casa Little Bird was great! All was as described, and everything was comfortable, with plenty of supplies and linens. Central location, and overall very relaxing stay. Savanna and Mark were wonderful hosts, and I would stay again, absolutely!
We had a wonderful stay at Savanna's house. It has every modern convenience, and was warm, uncluttered and very clean. Would definitely stay again!
Clean, comfortable and with a central location. Home worked perfectly for our family. Kitchen amenities were good and we also appreciated the washer/dryer! Would stay here again.

Enjoyed our stay at Los Alamos. It's convenient and quiet neighborhood, and everything looks as the photos. Check in was super easy and only a 2 min drive back to Central Ave where all the history to check out is. 2 great breweries in town - Bathtub row and Boese Bros, both with very friendly staff. Drive to Bandalier is only 25mins and is pretty (and a must see NM).
Would definitely recommend this home.

I really enjoyed my stay there. I felt happy and comfortable in the house and the location was very convenient.
I look forward to staying another time. I find Los Alamos such a beautiful and special place.

Savanna’s spot was perfect—exactly what you want an Airbnb to be— minimal and clean, but cozy. There was great hiking in walking distance. Savanna was exceptionally flexible, responsive, and helpful during our stay. I’m very happy she was our host for our Los Alamos trip!
Perfect house to stay in while visiting the area! Very convenient location, comfy bed and linens. Especially enjoyed sitting on the front porch during our down time.
We had a wonderful time. The house is as described. Plenty of space and everything works properly.

We had a great stay! The location was close to town in a quiet subdivision with nice hikes nearby.
We were also close to roads going to Valles Caldera and Bandelier Cliff Dwellings.
The hosts were quick to respond to any questions I had.
Thanks for hosting us.
Great place. Close drive to everything you need. House was clean and cozy.
Savannah’s place was just perfect for our family trip. We felt comfortable, safe, and right at home in the house. No complaints at all and would be happy to stay again.
This is a very nice place to stay in Los Alamos.
It was a little expensive, but the house is nice and everything went smoothly.
spacious home with great communication from the host. great central location with easy parking. friendly neighbors too!
Great stay for 6 weeks. Highly recommend
Nice and clean place to stay for few days.

This is a very nice place to stay. It was clean and comfortable. Very close to the places we wanted to see in town. I do have a couple of cautions, however. This house is designed for average height to tall people. I am only five feet tall. I could not reach any of the upper shelves, nor turn on the light over the sink, nor turn on the hall light. Those lights had switches on the lights themselves and the lights were almost ceiling height. Luckily, I have a six foot tall husband. One other caution is the dining area is a step down added-on room which also houses the refrigerator. This house would not be good for anyone with mobility problems. These are not complaints. Just a heads up to people wanting to find a house which meets their needs.
Enjoyed our stay. Casa Little Bird was exactly as described. It was super clean and the updated decor was so nice. We would definitely stay again.
A beautiful home away from home. The perfect base for Los Alamos, Bandelier, and the caldera.
Great place to stay

Savanna's home was just perfect for our visit to Los Alamos. Plenty of room for our family of 3. The home was nicely updated and convenient to Los Alamos attractions. Highly recommend Savannah's home in Los Alamos.

We came up with the family for a ski trip at pajarito, lodging can be very hard to find in Los Alamos because it’s so small but savannas place was great for a family, the kitchen and living areas were spacious and there was plenty of room for 2 grown ups and 2 little kids. About a 5 minute drive from “downtown” Los Alamos/historical sites and 15 minutes to pajarito…
Great comfy place. Very well equiped
Great place to stay. Comfortable and clean. Quiet neighborhood. We would stay here again
House in residential area about 1-2 miles from museums and restaurants. Close enough for an afternoon of snow showing at Valles Caldera.
This was a really nice, clean, and quiet stay. Conveniently located near downtown Los Alamos with a great well stocked kitchen setup. Definitely recommend for Los Alamos stays. Thank you Savanna!
Another wonderful stay!
Super cute house, well decorated and quaint. Close to the Pajarito ski area and to Bandelier. Had a great time exploring the area.
Wonderful location for the things we enjoyed doing - snowshoeing and hiking.
Home is cozy, clean and comfortable , and convenient location !
Another great stay at Savanna & Mark’s place. Consistently a clean, warm and welcoming place to stay while in Los Alamos. Many thanks for accommodating my last minute changes to my reservation!

Exactly what we were looking for. Good location, laid back, responsive hosts, and a nice place.
Thank you!

This place was just as described. We had a family of 6 all fit just fine. The kitchen had all the basics. Lots of pillows and towels. The beds were very comfortable. The place looks modern and very nice. We’d stay here again!

We come to Los Alamos a couple times per year. Mostly driving from SC to CA. We always have our dog and hotel stays are stressful for all of us. Finding a beautiful Airbnb so close to the LANL and a fenced it quiet neighborhood for all of us to move around, we were so happy! We will definitely be booking every time we are in the area!!

Good safe neighborhood. House was very comfortable even with 7 adults(3 teens). Amenities were modern and top rate. Hostess was responsive and friendly. Neighbors were also friendly, I needed an extension cord and a neighbor offered me one on New years day!
Casa Little Bird is a gem! I would highly recommend this home to anyone who wants to explore Los Alamos or the surrounding areas.
The place was clean and cozy, close to parks and hikes. Would stay again.
Great stay! Such a cute place and great location. Perfect for our family of 4.
Comfortable and well appointed. We found it easy to get around and had everything we needed.
Great home and comfortable stay
Great location and very nice and cozy home. Well equipped and would be great for a short or longer stay.
Great place to stay. Quiet and cozy. Would definitely recommend.

We enjoyed our stay at Casa Little Bird. The house was beautifully decorated, the beds were comfy, the shower was great, and the kitchen was well appointed. We enjoyed cooking a few meals at “home.” We loved the many hiking trails the area had to offer and of course Bandelier National Monument was amazing and so close. We took in the Nature Center and the History Museum. We definitely want to come back.

Another great stay at Case Little Bird! I will be back😊
The space has been consistently fabulous, clean, welcoming and Savanna is a great host!
We had a wonderful stay. The house was super clean, had everything we needed, and is close to trails and town. We hope to return!
Lovely house in a great location. Nice, quiet, neighborhood. We had a great time.
Place was clean and had everything you need.

Accurate description and pics, plenty of extra towels, blankets, pillows and a twin mattress in the closet. Check in was easy, responses were super fast. One firm bed, one soft one, so suited my family perfect. Close to Smith’s grocery store, Starbucks and some other restaurants and fast food places. Neighborhood felt very safe and comfortable. Would stay again for sure!
Savannah’s home is amazing, very clean, great for a small family and pets. We would definitely stay again if we’re in the area !
I didn’t stay personally but put up family for a wedding. They had nothing but good things to say about their stay!

Savanna and Mark were really good and helpful hosts - we never met them but they communicated very quickly and responded to all our questions and small issues with a very gracious attitude. The house is in a nice quiet neighbourhood in a good location for most areas in and around town. Check in was smooth and easy and we really appreciated the off-street parking. There is a small porch which overlooks a gravel yard and a car park, but round the corner you see the mountains. There were no views from most of the windows. The bed was very comfortable and the heating and hot water worked really well. The kitchen was an excellent user-friendly space for cooking meals.
Savanna’s place was great. It was extremely clean and had everything we needed! Would definitely stay again!

This place was cozy and cute, and the host was very helpful! The coffee supplies and LED fireplace were just what we needed post-hike and for a rainy boardgame day, and the host left clear directions to check in/out and operate the appliances. (For out of town visitors, Los Alamos has gorgeous trails and parks but not many food delivery options, so plan ahead if you want to stay in for dinner after working up a sweat on the trails.)
lovely home, beautiful and quiet neighborhood 🙂
house is fantastic, enjoyed cooking meals, great kitchen, great beds, would recommend

This home was perfect! We were in Los Alamos for our daughters wedding. The kitchen was stocked with everything we needed. The home was clean and welcoming. The fenced in yard was a great bonus for our little dog. We would definitely stay again!
Nice clean comfortable place to stay
Perfect location for a wedding in Los Alamos. Bigger than expected and perfectly described.
Great stay! Savanna’s place was perfect for me; quiet neighborhood and all the amenities you’ll need! Highly recommend for a stay in Los Alamos!

Savanna's sweet space in Los Alamos was just what our family needed to enjoy our visit to New Mexico! The house was convenietly located to stores, the farmer's market, and many day trips (Santa Fe, Jemez Springs, Bandalier, and Ojo Caliente). We all loved the crisp, clean feel of the modernly decorated house. All amenities were quality and readily available in the kitchen. I loved that there were extra bath towels, sheets, toiletries, pillows, and blankets! Savanna thought of everything! The beds were comfortable and the space, overall, really made us feel welcome and relaxed. We will definately stay at this gem the next time we are in town!
Excellent place to stay. If we are in town again will it definitely be our first choice! Thank you!

If I could give 10 stars I would! Great location within walking distance to everything Los Alamos offers. The place was spotless and very well stocked as well. Cute inside and out. Would stay again and again!

We visited our son for a few days, and this place was absolutely perfect in terms of both location and up-to-date accommodations. If he returns next summer, we’ll aim to book this same place if possible.

Wonderfully cute stay. Had everything you could think of to make your stay easy and stress free. Great communication throughout with simple to follow instructions. You can tell from the moment you walk in Casa Littlebird was well thought out with the guest in mind. From full cabinets of dish-wear, coffee, spices, toiletries. Everything was there so you didn’t have to worry. Best Airbnb I have stayed in to date.
Very clean and comfortable! Convenient location.
Super well equipped home. Recently remodeled interior with new appliances. Perfect for working remotely or as a base camp for exploring Bandelier and the Jemez.
Staying at Casa Little bird was just perfect for our los Alamos triathlon experience!
This was a wonderful place to stay! It was comfortable, cozy and just what I needed. If you are staying in Los Alamos, the location can’t be beat!
Great place. Convenient location.
Great stay at this lovely, updated home!
Very clean and well maintained home that makes you feel very comfortable being there. Host were very accommodating and made sure our stay was comfortable. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Really appreciate all the essentials and needed amenities are adequately provided. The house is lovely and cozy. The hosts are super responsive and friendly. The house does not have an ac which was clearly spelled out in the listing. Unfortunately we came in the week when there was a heat wave so the temperatures in the house were high, however the hosts have indicated that they will fix the issue soon.

Beautiful place in a quite neighborhood. Very convenient to visit Los Alamos City and all amazing natural parks around the city (Bandelier, Valles Caldera).
The hosts are amazing and the house is amazing too. We’ll be back.
If you want to have a perfect time in Los Alamos, Little Bird has to be your choice.

Such a lovely space! It was wonderful to get outside the city and sit on the porch swing. We even had a community of about 10 deer come thru the creek and backyard space💗 Location was just a short drive to soak in town or to the lake! All the amenities and thoughtful touches made for a very cozy and enjoyable stay. Also!! Best coffee spot!! Never have I ever had this many creamer options!
WiFi worked great on property. P.s. Thank you for all the games we could use! 💗

Perfect little getaway! I only wish we had more time to spend there. They went above and beyond with supplies, instructions, and things to do It was MUCH appreciated. Definitely a place we will return to!

We had a wonderful stay at Chad & Misty’s place. You cannot beat the scenery and serenity here, and it is located very well for exploring the Jemez valley. We had no troubles with the Wi-Fi while we were there and the place has everything you need and I really mean everything! We would love to stay again.

Definitely one of the best airbnbs that I I have stayed at. The location is centrally located to many of the sites to see in the Jemez mountains. You have a large front yard that has a creek running through it. The house itself is cozy and stocked with pretty much everything you may need for a few day stay in the mountains. I will definitely be staying here again.
WE really appreciated the communication. The location is great for an area with so many potential activities. The entire place was user-friendly and clean. We'd stay again .

Had such a lovely stay at the San Antonio Creek Getaway! It was picturesque location - stunning scenery to wake up to and explore. I appreciated the fully stocked coffee bar and bathroom amenities. Hosts were very responsive and you could tell a lot of thought was put into the decor and design of the space. Would 100% recommend staying here.

You can easily tell it's a new listing from an experienced host. Details show that they've though of all you may need for staying in the mountains. We cooked the instant noodles since we arrived very late. It's like an oasis in the desert.
Awesome place
We had a great stay in Los Alamos. Christopher's place was more than adequate for our family of five. Will consider staying in his place again if we go back to Los Alamos!

This home was beautiful for our first Airbnb rental. Beautiful location, with a very “homey” feel. Chris was responsive and attentive. He even left us a gift inside. My family in town were very impressed with the home and will recommend to other family visiting. Thank you for a great memory!
Great host. Accurate description in the listing.
My friends and I had a blast!

We had a great time at Christopher’s home. Everything was clean and well appointed. The Airbnb was supplied with all the necessities to make our stay comfortable. Los Alamos is a beautiful town and the Airbnb was close to all the main attractions.

Beautiful, well-appointed home. Very nice neighborhood, easy access to local trail system for hiking and mountain biking. Christopher provided detailed, easy to follow instructions for access and was immediately responsive with questions. Highly recommend this accomodation!
Fantastic place to stay and perfect for our family of 5. Convenient location, beautiful views, peaceful neighborhood.
The House on the Hill was ideally located for our needs. Christopher answered all of my questions immediately.
A great home in a wonderful neighborhood, just a few minutes walk from the town/hills boundary. Very comfortable and quiet. Christopher was very responsive. Would definitely stay there again!
Good place to stay
Thank you for the great stay!
Extremely comfortable home in a beautiful setting with responsive hosts! Loved every moment, will miss staying here!

This house was conveniently located, extremely clean and comfortable. Great beds and linens; well-equipped kitchen; wonderful neighborhood walking opportunities, Hosts were reliable and easily accessible. Loved the house, the location, and the town.
Kassandra was very helpful and responsive, a real pleasure!
Kassandra’s place was immaculate and so beautiful!! We had 6 adults and the space was PERFECT!! We HIGHLY recommend the House on the Hill. So clean and a WONDERFUL host!!!
Dry nice and clean home. Kassandra was very helpful with anything I needed and worked with me when I needed to extend my stay.
Would recommend for anyone staying in Los Alamos. Very comfortable and quiet. Away from traffic. Snacks and drinks provided.
I had a great stay. Dianne’s attention to detail is the best I've experienced with Airbnb!

Though we only stayed for a night, Dianne gave great recommendations for things to do in the area, and very thoughtfully provided snacks and coffee/tea for the morning. We’d happily stay again if we’re ever back in town!

Dianne’s place is curated with incredible detail, right down to USB port on both sides of the bed and a USB cable to use the TV as a monitor. I would definitely stay there again if traveling for business or on vacation.
Great!
Excellent
Dianne was an awesome host! The room and bathroom were as described in the listing.
So wonderful! Great place, totally private, clear and specific instructions. Just a great experience. Highly, highly recommend!
Dianne was an excellent host and provided ample info about the area - made it extremely easy to visit the area for the first time. I highly recommend this stay!
Good place to stay. Reasonable price and great host.
Dianne’s recommends for what to do and where to eat in Los Alamos we’re very helpful.
Excellent experience, would highly recommend and will I will definitely be returning! A++
This was a great place to stay the night in Los Alamos! Dianne was very responsive, and the room was exactly as described.
Niceroom,perfect for a business trip.
Exactly as described.
A beautiful place and surroundings. Very quiet and peaceful. Dianne is a great host and I will definitely stay again.
Always a quiet and restful stay!
Lovely place to stay, Dianne went above & beyond in providing thoughtful amenities (snacks, toothbrush, coffee / tea, etc.) Great local recommendations. Super clean space.
Lovely place to stay when visiting for the week. The personal touches were amazing from a small bottle of Advil to a replacement toothbrush. Truly a favorite!
The second time I’ve stayed at Dianne’s place- it’s a very quiet room. Great privacy. Will stay again!
The room was both quiet and comfortable. I highly recommend staying here.
The room is a 5 star experience with a touch of home.
Dianne’s place was perfect for a couple coming from out of town for my daughters wedding. They enjoyed the space and felt very comfortable.
Dianne is the perfect host for those LANL visitors that don't want to stay at a hotel...
Clean and nice !
Fantastic stay, very relaxing and clean.

The house is very clean, easy to check in.
Very helpful instruction, hostess is very responsive.
Very comfortable bed, had the best sleep on the trip
Great place to stay. Easy check in, beautiful neighborhood, and affordable. The bed was super comfy and the place had all I needed. I was in no hurry to leave and highly recommend.
This was our first air bnb and it was a wonderful experience. Our Dianne had everything a person could need including a great little spot outside to relax and enjoy our morning coffee.
Dianne is so sweet and helpful. The room has a large spacious desk that is great for working at. I would definitely reccomend this Airbnb.
A beautiful home. Great local recommendations. A well-stocked kitchen area. Big thumbs up!

I really enjoyed my stay at Dianne’s! My room itself met all my needs— private entry, bath, fridge, with snacks, etc. It was obvious that Dianne had put a lot of thought into the arrangement. I especially appreciated the lighting, especially leading up to the room, and to the bathroom! I loved the location— just 10 minutes away by car to the downtown district, and very close to a few nice and safe hikes. I had a wonderful time visiting my son, and with the hikes!
Great hosts with terrific detail and helpful information. Beautifully presented clean accommodation with all the bells and whistles you could need meeting all our requirements. Perfect!
Nice quiet room with private bath. Nice location. Peaceful beautiful views.
Nice place and nice price.
Clean comfortable and quite -- a good place to rest
This is a very cozy spot. Couldn't ask for anymore more for a short stay

Dianne was super responsive and accommodating for my check out needs as I was in town for a local triathlon. She allowed me to come back to shower an hour after checkout before hitting the road back home! I truly appreciated this accommodation and enjoyed my short stay!
Really nice place, fully stocked, easy check in and Dianne is a wonderful host.
The place was very clean and easy to check-in. Great room!

Dianne’s guest suite was perfect. Gorgeous views, very clean and cozy, and so many thoughtful touches that made my stay even more comfortable. The location and the town in general felt very safe. Will definitely be booking Diane’s place again if it is available next time I’m in town!

Dianne’s place was a beautiful, spacious and well appointed room; the bed was a cool tall four-poster with a good comfortable and supportive mattress and we enjoyed the beautiful view over the hillside from the front porch steps, surrounded by ponderosa pines and lovely gardens and landscaping. The space was private and had a huge walk-in closet kept our stuff out of the way; a great little snack center with a Keurig coffeemaker was a plus, with a great selection of coffee and tea pods. She had a great selection of books in the nightstand, and a well-stocked mini fridge and microwave. Loved being able to open the screened double door to let the fresh air in. The steep driveway and a flight of steps at top that led up to the entrance required a bit of effort but neither hubby and I had any trouble and we are of average fitness. Spacious private bath was clean and also well-appointed. Overall a great stay with wonderful and attentive hosts who responded to our every need. Will be back!
I had a fantastic stay, the location was beautiful and the room was a nice private room.
It was lovely, comfortable, and Dianne was an amazing host!
If you are looking for a spot in Los Alamos. This is the Airbnb to go for! Easy accessible!
The room was very clean and comfortable with nice and thoughtful amenities. My wife and I enjoyed our stay here and would stay again.
Good place for a night as we rolled through Los Alamos

Very clean and convenient! We came for a race nearby and just wanted a place to sleep and set up basecamp, and it was great! We appreciated the easy and independent access to the location and privacy.
A delightful space, with thoughtful extra touches, including snacks, and drinks. I highly recommend.
Dianne's Airbnb is a wonderful place to stay. Checking in was easy and communication was excellent. I was very comfortable and would absolutely stay here again. Highly recommended. Thanks, Dianne!
This is my second stay. Excellent accommodations plus many many extras.
Dianne and Scott's place was very comfortable. And the complimentary snacks and drinks were a pleasant surprise.
Thanks for the great stay! A perfect place for those in need of a short stay, lots of nice amenities, snacks, drinks. Feels nice and private from the rest of the house.
The place was spotless, comfortable, and quiet. The snacks and drinks were great after a long day on the road. Loved that toiletries were provided.

As a solo traveller in Los Alamos, this was the ideal place. Dianne went above and beyond with providing extra amenities and information about the area. I requested to book the room extremely last minute (~8pm the night before check in), and Dianne accepted my request extremely quickly. The room felt very private despite being attached to the house thanks to the private entrance and bathroom. Los Alamos is a must-see city for any science nerd, and I would definitely book with Dianne again.
One of the best AirBnB experiences I’ve had! It’s great for working remotely, and the area is beautiful! Will definitely stay here again if I return to Los Alamos!

Dianne’s place is exactly what I hope for in an Airbnb. Great location, comfortable room, excellent bed, privacy but also attentive and friendly interaction with the hosts. I would love to stay at Dianne’s again.
Fabulous private room and bathroom. Many extras were provided such as drinks, snacks and beer/wine.
A wonderful private room for our first time in New Mexico. Lovely location! We felt comfortable and Dianne was super responsive to any questions I had.
Excellent room. Very clean and quiet. The bed was so comfortable!

Dianne's guest suite was a perfect quiet spot to rest after a long day of skiing the Caldera. I appreciated all of the extra touches and amenities. As a solo female traveler, I also recommend this as a great and safe option for other solo female travelers.

Dianne was a great host! Very accommodating and provided lots of information about the area and attractions. The space is thoughtfully decorated and Dianne included lots of little extras to make our stay comfortable. Thank you so much!
I would stay there again in the future.
Dianne's place was great. Nice, quiet, clean and very accommodating.

This was one of the best Airbnb accommodations in our many travels. The bed is super comfortable and Diane has the room thoughtfully stocked with treats, beverages, water, coffee, cream for your coffee, etc. The bathroom is beautiful with luxuriously heated floors, robes to wear, and supplies if needed. She is the ultimate host! Dianne includes detailed instructions and helpful tips for the surrounding area. We were so pleased!
We had a lovely one night stay. Everything was as described.

Very comfortable and peaceful place to stay. Short drive to town. Dianne was a gracious host and provided amenities beyond what is typical. We really appreciated the coffee, robes and snacks! Thank you!

I have enjoyed my stay. Dianne is a wonderful host with prompt communication. Inside was clean and pristine. The extra refreshments and toiletries were a nice add-on! I have already booked future stays here.
Beautiful room, very comfortable and quiet. all instructions were very clear, and the house was easy to find. I enjoyed my stay and would definitely book again.
Very clean with lots of nice touches.
Stay was great. Clean and comfortable
My favorite stay in Los Alamos!
Dianne’s home was a great place to stay when visiting Los Alamos!
My home away from home

Dianne and her husband Scott were such lovely hosts! It's a pretty and quiet setting, about an 11-minute drive from town. Dianne and Scott were responsive, friendly, and went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and accommodated during my stay. I felt very well cared for. Keep in mind that this is not truly a separate unit - it is attached to their home and there is only a curtain in between the main house and your unit. That said, the space is comfortable for 1 person, with great internet, a comfortable bed, and a comfortable bathroom. There is no kitchen. Thank you for a lovely stay!
Always comfortable and easy!

The room was perfect and had much more than we needed. Very clean, quiet, and relaxing. We would not hesitate to stay here again in the future. Communication and check-in was effortless. Highly recommended.
Very clean, private, and has many amenities. Highly recommended.

Best Airbnb experience I've ever had. These people are lovely and I was made to feel very welcome. The bed was comfortable and the rabbit was very cute. If I were to come back to the area I would gladly return to their home. Thanks again for everything!
Great location and great accommodations.
Always easy and restful.
perfect stay and beautiful property, lots of natural light and comfy bed and linens.
The best!
Always great.
Beautiful spot, very quiet neighborhood and on hot nights it’s the perfect spot due to the wonderful draft the windows create to keep you cool.
Home away from home!

Diane's guest room was everything we hoped for. Cutely decorated and had everything we needed as far as space and the feel of privacy. We enjoyed sitting outside in the morning and listening to the birds. Great spot highly recommend!!
Very nice place to stay. Diane is very friendly and helpful. The room was comfortable and pleasant. Everything is very clean and well kept.

This was a very nice room, with private entrance and private bathroom, in a lovely home in a quiet neighborhood about 6 miles from the museums, lab, etc, in Los Alamos. As stated, the room was up an outside set of steps, which might represent a challenge for some, but I liked it because the room was high above the street--kind of like a treehouse! Good views, too; I even saw an elk strolling down the street.
Always a comfortable and easy stay!
This was a great little respite spot for us as we spent time in Los Alamos. Everything was neat and tidy. I would happily recommend this to friends.

Description is accurate - clean bedroom, bathroom and small fridge/Keurig area. Diane has stocked lots of little items one might need - in the bathroom and drinks/small snacks for guests. Communication was good and check-in had specific details to help walk us through step-by-step. The outside area to sit in is beautiful and quiet (even while still in the middle of a neighborhood). Enjoyed our stay!

Will be my go to spot if I need a place to stay in Los A. The accommodations were great. All I need in one spot, I like that there is lots of window and natural light. Cozy with a porch to enjoy a couple of trees and birds chirping. Area was nice and quiet. Main part of town is like they say about ten min away but nice drive. Made me want to spend time in to enjoy, wish i was there for vacation vs work. Hope to stay there again.
My new favorite spot to stay :) Very comfortable with everything I need.

Great and convenient Airbnb spot. The private entrance is a really nice touch and the room has everything you need for your stay. Host is extremely communicative and easy to work with, I really enjoyed my stay.

Dianne is a FANTASTIC host! She was so quick to respond to our messages and fixed an issue we had with lightning speed. The room is spacious and beautiful. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend Dianne’s place to anyone!
Very comfortable and quiet, with very thoughtful amenities and special touches. Look forward to my next stay.
Good location, clean, cute, and cozy. Neighborhood was quiet and we slept soundly.
Dianne and Scott are warm and engaging hosts. Their attention to detail regarding all things related to the room and visiting Los Alamos demonstrates their commitment to their guests enjoyment.
This is my second time staying with Dianne. Everything was great!

Great place to stay in LA. I totally loved the space. The room was private and super quiet. It could not have been cleaner! The coffee pods and drinks were a really nice amenity. If I need a place in LA, I will hopefully be able to stay here again. Thanks, Dianne!

Great place! Really liked the private entrance and all the natural light and nice quiet neighborhood. Room and bathroom was clean and more spacious than it seemed in the photo. Would definitely stay there again.
Great value and wonderful accommodations. Perfect place to stay in Los Alamos!

Gorgeous home in a beautiful area of Los Alamos. Dianne and Scott's home is stunning! The room we rented, is a well thought of space with great amenities. The bathroom is connected by a short hallway with a few stairs, which leads from the bedroom to the bathroom.
We were there visiting family, and only needed a room for overnights. Dianne and Scott's place was perfect for us. Highly recommend!
I totally recommend this place. It’s quiet and Dianne is very welcoming and accommodating.
This room is exactly as listed. It's spacious, quiet, and the private bathroom has a great shower! I had a very nice stay.
I totally recommend this place! It is comfy-cozy!

This is the perfect retreat if you are visiting Los Alamos-comfortable, inviting, and so quiet. Located on the north Mesa, it has a wilderness feel but is just a short drive to the lab and amenities of downtown Los Alamos. Do not miss Chili Works for a breakfast burrito, or Bathtub Brewery for a beer after a long day!

An excellent stay! The check-in process was very simple and I loved having the private bathroom. The room was clean, the bed was fresh, and everything about my stay was comfortable. There are motion-activated lights in the hallway as well, so you can use the bathroom when it's dark.
Although I did not need any, there were refreshments in the room along with a coffee machine. They have maps and books in the room that detail the LANL and New Mexico, which was a very nice touch. Very nice place to get work done and see Los Alamos!
Dianne was communicative before and during my stay, which I appreciated. The room was clean and cozy. I would totally stay there again and recommend this place!
Perfect spot to stay and explore in and around Los Alamos.
Very nice place! Diane responds quickly and the room was clean and comfortable.
I loved this place and will definitely be looking to stay there again when in town. so much of it was easily accessed and clean and had a great stay!! highly recommend.

Great stay for a single person traveling to the Los Alamos area. Clean and simple room with excellent hosts always there for whatever you need. Would stay here again!
Prateek
Vera clean, quiet and easy to get ahold of
Diane’s place is very clean and has lots of nicely thought out accommodations. She is very accommodating and quick to respond.
A very nice and clean house in the mountains!
A lovely bedroom atop a quiet hill with every amenity.
A very nice and private configuration that lets you come-and-go as you please with just about everything you could need, but hosts are there if anything is needed.
Nice walking area without a lot of traffic. Trails nearby. Great view if you walk to the back fence. Very peaceful.
Kind host, thoughtful accomodations, comfortable stay.
Beautiful home, very peaceful!
This place is a gem! Best value in Los Alamos. Spacious room, comfortable bed, and gracious and responsive hosts. We’ll definitely look to book here on our next stay.
Very clean, great communication and even more accommodating.
Nice room

Dianne's place was clean, quiet, and perfectly located in Los Alamos. The way the room was prepped made me feel welcome, and the complementary drinks and Keurig was just so nice to come home to. She is very responsive, and she knows her area so well enough to provide any recommendation you may need! I'd love to be back.

I totally lucked out when Dianne posted her apartment for the first time post-pandemic. The room is spotlessly clean and airy, with high ceilings and cross ventilation from three windows making it extra comfortable. Many thoughtful touches including motion-detector nightlights for navigating the way to the hallway bathroom. The mini fridge was stocked with extras, the keurig and the microwave were life-savers. While the apartment is in a private home and one is aware of the owner's presence, it is not intrusive -- nice combination of privacy as well as safetly for a solo traveller. The few times we intersected, Diane was friendly and solicitous. I feel so lucky this room opened when it did and plan to return!
Awesome place!
Great location and price for visiting Los Alamos. Very clean and good communication. Highly recommend.
Excellent spot to stay in Los Alamos!

This lovely space in Dianne's home has a private entance and private bathroom around the corner with a comfortable bed. It is a beautiful contemporary home with high ceilings in an upscale Los Alamos neighborhood. It was an excellent location to experience the town and all the history, stunning scenery, and easy access to Bandalier Nat. Pk among other great places to hike and explore.
Dianne was a sweet host and we appreciated her making the space available to us rather last minute! The driveway is quite long and steep and was slippery when we left in the morning with some icy patches. We heard that the weather was colder and wetter than usual for the end of Feb.
I look forward to returning.
Excellent place to stay in Los Alamos. I will be back!
The hospitality is incredible. The house is beautiful

Great Los Alamos Airbnb. It's about a 10 minute drive to the lab and the main part of Los Alamos. The room and bathroom were very clean and I loved the self check-in and separate entrance. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. I enjoyed my stay!
I keep coming back to Dianne's so that should tell you all you need to know.
Im a repeat guest! Dianne's is a wonderful place to stay when visiting Los Alamos.
I am a repeat guest - This is my goto place when I come to Los Alamos. Dianne's place checks all the boxes and then some!
You have a private bathroom with a sparkling clean bedroom.
The place is great!
Great host.
Diane is a great host and the room is fantastic. I love how easy and convenient check in is and I’ll continue to stay here when I’m in the area.

Dianne’s place was beautiful! Extremely clean and had thoughtful touches (make up towels for cleaning your face!). It had a private entrance with a private bathroom. Coffee maker, fridge, and water as well as cups in your room. Every thoughtful touch, Dianne has planned for! Additionally check in was a breeze and she’s extremely communicative should you need anything! She also offers walks with her goats and llama. I really recommend it! It was a highlight for sure!
Very clean and comfortable room. Good value and very responsive host!
Beautiful space! Extremely clean and close to everything. Quiet neighborhood in a beautiful location! Dianne is very attentive and helpful in the booking process!
Great place. Bathroom use was very private in evenings and mornings. Great nightlights too.
Very nice and cozy!
Definitely a clean friendly host that offers a great room with bathroom and private entrance. Excellent local tips too!
Best place to stay in Los Alamos! Super clean, neighborhood is quiet. Haven’t slept so well in a long time!
She is not kidding about the steep drive and stairs.
Dianne’s place is great! The space is very clean and quiet. Dianne provided a lot of amenities, including snacks and drinks, and was polite and friendly. I highly recommend booking this room.
This spot was great, a perfectly relaxing place to stay for a quick work trip. Would definitely stay again :)
Oustanding place to stay, everything is perfect! Dianne and her husband are very friendly and even invited me to a dinner they very well organized!!
I stayed here for two months. I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay! Dianne has been an excellent host.
Excellent choice
Great host, perfect location.
Dianne is a great host. She provides snacks and a variety of coffee. The check in was easy and the place was spotless and comfortable. Would highly recommend

We came into Dianne's after a long tour around New Mexico visiting family, hiking and exploring. Did a little more exploring there near Jemez Springs and crashed exhausted both days into a comfortable bed, wonderful towels, quiet house and lovely atmosphere! We had everything we needed and Dianne was so kind and gracious. We'd love to come back to stay again!

The room was very welcoming; nicely furnished, warm and cozy. It is an extremely quiet place; very restful. The amenities provided for our every need. Dianne provided easy access for our late arrival. We definitely would choose this place if we were to be in Los Alamos again.
This place is definitely great. Highly recommended.

This is my second time here and it was as great as last time. My husband came with me this trip and it is comfortable for two. It is a peaceful room, and Dianne provides nice touches like coffee and beverages and photos on the coffee mugs. Dianne is quick to communicate so there is no confusion about check-in, and questions are answered quickly.
This was the perfect place for my quick overnight stop in Los Alamos. The host has thought of almost everything, and I slept well. Highly recommended!
Nice place to rest your head. Dianne is prepared and ready to provide a comfortable stay. I would definitely recommend!
very peaceful

This location was wonderful, I had a great time staying here, so cozy, homey and the owners are great! Super clean, little touches, amenities were great. I felt safe, welcomed and loved. We had a great time walking with Dianne and her goats and llama and feeding her animals. She has animals in a off site barn, make sure you go with her one morning, it is a beautiful fun experience. Will be back, the home is gorgeous! Loved my experienced and made new friends...
After a long day of travel, this space was perfect with a private entrance, tidy room, & bathroom. The host also provided Keurig drinks & snacks that made this a 5 star stay. Would recommend!

I have had the adventure of a lifetime 😂 Not in a good way as I traveled by car from Michigan to New Mexico for a wedding. Our vehicle broke down. I had to cancel my reservations. The day after I was able to get a rental and contacted Dianne if I could still stay. She was more than willing to give us our room back and even an extra night! She was so nice and had lots of information/advice to give us while staying in Los Alamos. Extremely clean and very private. Absolutely loved our stay with amazing hospitality!
This is one of my favorite places. Such a beautiful house and atmosphere
Dianne's home is very comfortable and clean! We thoroughly enjoyed staying with her. The room was private and the location is great if you are skiing at Pajarito! Thanks Dianne!!
Dianne's home is very clean, the directions were very clear, and communication was great. Her home was a convenient place to rest as we skied and explored the area. We would definitely stay again!
Great place to stay. Bed was very comfortable and everything was nice and clean. Dianne and her husband were very nice. Would stay here again next time I'm on the hill.
This home is lovely, clean and welcoming. I will definitely stop here again if my business brings me to Los Alamos.
Clean, roomy, & great value. Plenty of room for 2 & thoughtful bath robes & plenty of pillows & blankets. The host is nearby so all I had to do was text her & she could make it happen!!
Easy check-in.
My stay was very enjoyable and the hosts were very kind and hospitable!
Great room, hospitable host.

The room is clean and bright. Quick responses to questions. My only note would be that the full size bed isn’t the best for two tall adults.
Nice neighborhood.

Great spot for LANL workers, it's a little out of town, but the neighborhood is quiet. There may be guests above you as well, which you will certainly hear (we heard cell phones on vibrate, booming footsteps and water usage, luckily it seemed everyone was on the same schedule). The hosts are great and left us snacks and were friendly if we happened to see them outside. The linens were very nice including the plush towels. The heated floors were great, but the thermostat seemed locked at 63 degrees so we were chilly most of the time and had to bring an electric blanket to keep warm at night (the room has a lot of windows for heat to escape). There is a private entrance, but the hallway to the bathroom is in the main house, a room divider is placed over the entrance to give a sense of privacy but you know you're in the house and can hear conversations in the kitchen/living room with your door shut/ smell dinner cooking. Compared to other places, it was awesome for the price.

Excellent hostess. Everything I needed was where Diane said it was. Great private entrance and it was easy to find the home!! I've been using airbnb for 4 years & Diane is definitely 5 stars!!! I will be back!!!
Everyone is right, this place is really clean, we didn't want for anything. The heated floors in the bathroom are super nice. Check in and entry couldn't have been easier. We felt right at home.
The room is lovely and comfortable. I had a great stay!

They're such wonderful hosts and willing to work around my strange schedule.
I've added them to my preferred list.

Very impressive. This was my first Airbnb experience, so I didn’t really know what to expect. A friend and I went on a last minute trip, and this host was very prompt and professional. There was a lot of thought put into it, and you could tell the host knew what they’re doing. It was very private, very thoughtful, and an amazing deal.
The room has keurig coffee machine available. The mini fridge is convenient. I really enjoy the level of cleanness Dianne offers. Very quiet all day long. Great place to stay.

Dianne's place is great. Private bath was super clean with plush towels and bathrobes. It was easy to find and in a beautiful location. Tea/coffee, beverages and granola bars were appreciated. Check in was easy. Thanks Dianne!
Great location, stylish place.
The room is very clean and cozy, and includes a stocked snack fridge and coffee. We definitely had a comfortable night's sleep there.
Very comfortable and clean rental in independence, perfect for people who like to have a lot of privacy. It was nice to have little things to snack and drink in the room.

Space is very clean and comes with everything you need for a little bit longer stay, including mini-fridge, Keurig coffee, plates (and fuzzy robe!). Check in is a breeze, and the hosts are very accommodating.
Dianne was quick to reply, accommodating and helpful. Check-in and check-out was a breeze. Great place to stay.
What a beautiful home! In a quiet neighborhood 10 min. from downtown Los Alamos. Dianne put lots of thoughtful details into the room: snacks, a Keurig, toothpaste, etc.

My husband and I had an amazing stay at Dianne's place. Communication was quick and responsive and the self check-in made everything easy. The house is absolutely gorgeous and in a great part of Los Alamos making it easy to sight-see and go to the attractions of the area. What we appreciated more than anything though was the excellent hospitality. We had mentioned
that we would be celebrating our first anniversary and Dianne went out of her way to make it special, purchasing us a sparkling rosé wine as a surprise. I highly recommend staying at Dianne's place when in the Los Alamos/Santa Fe area!

My stay was comfortable, pleasant and very convent to everything in town. The room and bath are lovely. The bed is a very comfy, vintage four poster with lots of quilts in the closet. The private entrance with its little stoop with a view was great. The room has brand new appliances, a microwave, fridge and Keurig coffee maker plus a nice selection of coffee pods. (I only bought one meal the whole time I was there.) There were even a few cold beverages waiting in the fridge. All in all an excellent choice.

This was one of the best Airbnb experiences that I have had. The room and private bathroom were very clean. The bed was comfortable. I loved the small touches such as the set of plates and mug set out and drinks in the fridge. There were also all of the toiletries that you could possibly need. I felt very comfortable and at home.
The location is beautiful and very quiet. It is a 10 minute drive to restaurants, Ashley Pond and the lab.
Dianne was fast to respond and the booking process was incredibly easy. I would highly recommend anyone to stay at her home.
Very clean, sunny and quiet room to spend the night.

My daughter stayed here on her road trip and said the suite was super clean and the bed was very comfortable, everything you would need to shower etc. was provided, and the mini fridge and coffees were a really thoughtful addition! Dianne provided an info sheet about the area that was super helpful, and it was a quick trip from the house into downtown Santa Fe. Would definitely recommend this room to anyone traveling through the area :)
Lovely accommodations.
Wonderful place in Los Alamos. Dianne is a very thoughtful host.
Simple, clean, no nonesense room and location. Perfect for a one night overnight in Los Alamos.

It was a very nice to stay at Dianne´s, the room was spacious, the bathroom wonderfully comfortable and clean. The area was far better than we expected, no problem leaving the car at the front door. We felt very comfortable and would recommend Dianne to everyone, who wants to stay in Los Alalmos.

Great place to stay
Jennifer was extremely friendly and helpful

There was going to be 3 people for our stay but it was only 2. Very small space, reminds me of a dorm room. Issues with the television, when watching the top of screen darkens & makes it hard to see. The wall heater in the living room stopped working (we were cold very cold). There is no door on the bathroom (just a curtain), so there is no privacy. The shower handle in the bathroom was broken so controlling the hot/cold was difficult. In addition, the bathroom is located through the bedroom. This should have been specified in the listing and would have been helpful in deciding whether to book the stay (sound, odor, shower steam coming directly into bedroom.) Kind of pricey for the space. I paid a total of $558.73 ($183.26 a night for 3 nights). The other bed, which is a sleeper sofa, located in the living room, so when the other guest is trying to rest & you need something in the kitchen, you are disturbing them. This space reminds me of a dorm room. We left before out stay was over.

Jennifer’s place was conveniently located near the sites we wanted to see in Los Alamos and Bandelier National Monument. There was plenty of room for the two of us and we enjoyed the views of the canyon.

This apartment would be ideal for one person, but is a bit cramped for two. It could also use an actual dining table. And we were unable to make the gas fireplace (the only heat source) operate by using the remote, but Jennifer and her husband were very helpful in explaining how to operate it manually, so it wasn't a big problem. Some of the reviewers complained about traffic noise, but we didn't find that to be a problem either (although we were there in March, and didn't have the bedroom window open).

Host is super friendly and accommodating. Room has a full kitchen with excellent appliances, tall spacious ceilings, and lots of wood that makes it feel kinda like a cozy cabin. 20 minute walk to TA-3 at LANL and 20 minute walk to the supermarket.
I’ve stayed at several of Jennifer’s places and I have never been disappointed! She is responsive and accommodating! They are always immaculate and as described
Wonderful host
This is our second stay in Jennifer’s place, and with an extension discount, Thank you very much. We’ll be back as it suits our needs.
Great accommodations for our needs. Jennifer was very responsive and sensitive about problematic cable television service and got it resolved quickly. We’ll be back.
Jennifer was amazing! I have stayed at several of her locations and have always been pleased!

Jennifer was a great host! We were in a tight spot just a week before relocating 2000 miles to Los Alamos and Jennifer graciously accommodated our situation. Grateful to her and this Airbnb, would recommend her place to anyone heading to Los Alamos!
Very good apartment, as advertised. Jennifer was very helpful and responsive. It met our needs very well during this stay.
Cute little apartment. Very cozy. Pull out bed was comfortable
our hunters in the family absolutely loved staying at Jennifer's and wanted to stay longer, it was super nice! Jennifer was great to work with, clear communication and very responsive
This place is just about perfect. Modern, clean, pleasant. Good location. Highly recommend.
Nice place. had everything I needed for a comfortable stay.
This was our 2nd stay at Jennifer's. Both times, we stayed for a week while visiting family in Los Alamos. Both times, our stay was great. The facility is well equipped and clean. We will be back.
Nice, convenient to town, quiet, and well stocked for cooking and laundry.
Awesome little spot! Host was very sweet and fast at responding. Clean and comfy. Easy communication. Thank you
Modern decor and convenient location.
Jennifer's place is lovely - the kitchen is particularly fantastic. Good location. She's also a kind person who went above and beyond for me and my husband. Would definitely stay there again!
The helpfulness and communication with the host was great. The place is nice and has good appliances. There was an issue with the heater when we arrived, but it was handled shortly after we asked.
The place is very clean and cozy. I’m on a special home-cooked diet, and this place has a fully equipped kitchen that could meet my needs. Our host Jennifer was very nice and responsive.
Jennifer and Curtis are great to work with. Their place is as convenient as you could hope for in Los Alamos.
This location was ideal for commuting to the lab. It’s clean, comfortable, and the hosts were very accommodating

This place was so nice to stay at for five weeks before we moved into our house. Curtis and Jennifer were so kind and accommodating!
I will say that on hot days the living area can get warm, but it is doable and the bed is on the firmer side, just to be prepared for that.
During the night it is important to have the window open by the bed with the fan, since the nights are cool. Luckily we were never warm at night.
The kitchen was great and the location was perfect!

Clean, spacious, and with a great view. Some information about check-in and the WiFi was out of date, but the hosts responded to all of my questions fairly quickly. Other than that, the place was great!
Really nice clean studio. All new great location easy access. Friendly helpful host. Thanks
I booked this rental for my uncle. Curtis and Jennifer were very prompt and responsive in terms of coordinating the check-in, etc. My uncle said that place was 'great'.

This is an excellent spot in Los Alamos, centrally located, well-equipped and comfortable. If you are doing work at the lab, or spending a few days sightseeing, this is a great spot. Curtis and Jennifer are great hosts, and the studio has everything you need to be comfortable.
Great hospitality, convenient location and cozy.

Staying right along Trinity drive was great! I stayed there as a summer intern and the location couldn't have been more convenient. Curtis is also a wonderful host and was very quick to respond to anything I needed.
This was a very comfortable spot for an extended stay and the view out back was wonderful for storm watching when they rolled in.
Great place to stay!
Curtis’s place was great. Very close to LANL and everything in Los Alamos. Very clean and great parking. Communication was very quick. Would highly recommend.

Very cozy and clean place to stay in Los Alamos. This apartment provides a better value than area hotels. The appliances are fairly new and having a washer and dryer available is a plus. Just be aware that there is no a/c (typical of many homes in town) and other than hand soap, no toiletries are provided. Not a big deal as long as you know ahead of time. Curtis was a responsive and accommodating host.
Nice studio apartment conveniently located. Optimal for short-term visitors at LANL.
Delightful, well designed space. Well appointed with a lovely canyon view from the living space / kitchenette.

This is a great, functional space in Los Alamos. Best part: there's dishwasher, so you can hit the coop or Thursday farmers market & cook up a storm without having to do chores :) Chances are, if you're looking at this place it's because you have stuff to do at the lab, but IMO it's also good "home base" for vacations if you're into hiking... and it's waaaay more affordable than staying in Santa Fe. (Just be aware, vacationers, that Los Alamos is extremely spartan.)
Very comfortable.
Excellent location and close to town. Curtis is always very responsive. It’s nice to be able to walk to town.
If you are looking for a comfortable and clean place to stay in Los Alamos, this is the place. If you are working in the Hospital, you can walk to work!
Great place to stay

The place is outstanding before 8am and after 6pm. One can walk to the swimming pool ~10 min and to the lab. Location, size, kitchen are great. The place does not have AC. Sealing fans and open doors partially compensate lack of the AC. The TV has an HDMI cable than can be hooked up to a laptop: yielding a workplace with a screen at 3900 x 2000 pixel resolution :-)
This was our second stay here. Our comments for this time are the same as for the 8/16 trip. We would stay here again.

Exceptional location for a visitor to Los Alamos Labs - walking distance to lab and town. A beautifully organised studio flat with comfy bed in a beautiful location. Curtis bent over backwards to sort things out when there was a plumbing problem at the weekend. I would stay again here in a flash, and have recommended it to all my collaborators in the lab who are looking to put visitors up in peace and quiet when visiting.
Wifi is good, kitchen and bathroom have everything you could want, and you can start a hike down the canyon from the back door!

It is on the main road, but noise was not bad with the fan on. The property is the only residential unit in a Medical office building that was not very busy at all. Very nice on the inside with a large kitchen. There is no bathroom door do to the size of the unit. Washer and dryer and all appliances are new. There is no AC and heat is from a beautiful gas stove. We used a box fan and were fine even though it was in the upper 80's. This is a great location to visit.
Unit is clean and convenient to Los Alamos activities
Great apartment! Clean, quiet, private. Perfect for a weekend getaway. We enjoyed our time here.
Great place!
Great accommodations, great value. Highly recommend to any visitors to hotel-scarce Los Alamos.

Beautiful apartment. Love the accommodations. Having a brand new, full kitchen and washer & dryer is so great when traveling. Great location too. Everything was perfect. I will be recommending this place to my sister and her husband when they come to visit.

We enjoyed the location, which was within about a half mile walk of everything in town, and Chile Works. The unit was new, clean, and comfortable, although fairly small for two people with hiking gear. With the bedroom window open in the summer, there is a fair amount of traffic noise from Trinity Drive, and the living room is a little noisy due to the compressor next door during the day. But we were not in the room a lot and the noises did not bother us much. We would stay there again.
It was a great little place, I enjoyed my stay.

This was a great trip for us especially with how easy it was to deal with Curtis for lodging. There aren't many hotel rooms available in Los Alamos without booking well ahead. Having the airbnb option allowed our trip to happen! The location was superb within easy walking distance of Old Town and an easy drive to the Smiths Marketplace.
Highly recommend!!! Great place to stay! Clean and comfortable!

Wonderful accomodations, well appointed and very comfortable. Quiet neighborhood with nearby access to great walking trails. Mary was very responsive and provided welcome information about local restaurants and nearby attractions. Highly recommend this listing.

We recently stayed at Mary's Airbnb in White Rock, New Mexico, for the annular eclipse, and it was an exceptional experience. The place was impeccably clean, spacious, and perfectly located. Mary and Caleb were an outstanding hosts, offering warm hospitality and providing thoughtful snacks.
White Rock and the surrounding area are brimming with exciting attractions and activities. Mary's valuable local insights and recommendations added to the overall enjoyment of our trip.
Thank you, Mary, for making our eclipse adventure so memorable. We hope to return to the area in the future as there is so much to see and do in this amazing landscape.

Mary’s rental unit worked beautifully for my friend and I! We were three nights there and had everything we needed. The unit was exactly as pictured, although it seemed even bigger than the photos made it look. The fridge and freezer are actually larger than I was expecting. We had no trouble fitting all of our perishables in them. Mary was a friendly and responsive host. We were lucky enough to get to meet Mary and her husband in person, which was a treat for us. The neighborhood is quiet with a grocery store, post office, gas station, and area visitor center very close by.
I would definitely stay at Mary’s house again in the future! Thank you Mary!
Easily one of the nicest Airbnbs I have stayed at. Very well equipped and lots of included food etc, and a good bookshelf. Convenient location for both Bandalier and Los Alamos.
Mary’s Airbnb was perfect for my stay and found it to be a pretty cozy stay. You can tell they are very proactive and offer beyond expectations. The house was clean and had nice decorations.

We had easy access to White Rock Overlook which we painted daily for our plein air paint out. It was quiet and very private.
Mary was very responsive throughout the transaction. It worked great for our stay.

Mary was kind and patient, in spite of us changing our arrival and departure days at the last minute. She was very easy to work with and the place was lovely and homey. The ample parking was an added bonus.
Mary’s place was great to stay at! Nice neighborhood and the town is in a gorgeous area!

Mary’s was very comfortable and spotless!! One of the cleanest I have stayed in. Nice little treats from snacks, drinks and breakfast goodies. Very peaceful neighborhood. Great stay for the price. We would stay again.

Mary was a wonderful host. She gave us information that allowed us to enjoy the area more. I would have enjoyed a longer visit with her and her husband. The place was nicely decorated and the beds were very comfortable. The snacks and drinks were a nice touch.
The only downsides were the funky, musty smell and having to wash the dishes in the bathroom sink. A sink in the main room with the fridge would definitely make staying again more of a pleasure.
Mary was extremely gracious and accommodating. Her home was perfect for our little getaway to get in some snowboarding at pajarito!
The host was very accommodating host was really good at communicating very kid friendly!
Hosts were great! Even offered to pick up a pizza for us while they were out!
Very homey and comfortable. Everything we needed! Very clean and neat. Will choose again!

Why my experience was bad:
Due to my recent move and retiring from the military, things had been extremely tight financially. We chose this place because it was close to my new job and the children’s new school. We only booked for 4 days because I was scheduled to finally receive reimbursement after 2 months of living in hotels and Airbnbs with my children, and my property manager decided to allow us to move in early as long as we had the funds to do so. On the second night of our stay we needed the tank pumped and this upset the hosts. However they were extremely nice and accommodating.
My emotional support animal was living out of our vehicle which was parked on the street because this listing does not have parking on the property. I had been checking on her, feeding her, and making sure the car wasn’t too hot or cold. However, the window was cracked and she must have climbed out. I was extremely anxious, sad, and distraught about this as expected. When I saw the hosts’ cat while I was sitting outside the camper, I messaged the hosts about this and not only did I not get an answer, but to add insult to injury she falsely reported me to Airbnb support saying I had a cat in the camper. Which obviously if that were true, the cat would not have run away. She was likely spooked and was looking for a warmer safe place.
To make matters even worse, after me explaining our financial situation and everything that was going on, the hosts requested $200 for damages, even though there were no damages. This made me extremely uncomfortable. My plan was to send a thank you note after this stay because they seem like really nice people up until this all happened. My family and I stayed in my car until someone was nice enough to help us with a hotel for the night. It was in a pretty scary neighborhood, but we were still more comfortable there and able to take showers and use the bathroom without the fear that we would be inconveniencing anyone.
I truly believe that you will enjoy your stay. Which is why I still give this listing a 4 star. I feel that the host reacted emotionally which is unprofessional and that is the only reason it wasn’t a 5 star for me. Don’t let this keep you from booking this beautiful camper in this amazing and quiet neighborhood.

Emily's Yurt is a fun experience. Emily is an excellent host. Located in a very nice and quiet neighborhood. Emily gave me great recommendations for dining and hiking locations. White Rock is great place to visit. Highly recommend it.

Everything good. Cody yurt!

Emily's yurt was a cozy and charming place of retreat. She clearly communicates all the instructions for using the amenities of the dwelling and promptly replies to any questions. The setting was peaceful and private. Our first experience clamping was amazing!
Emily's yurt was very cozy and decorated beautifully. The outdoor space was designed beautifully and felt very private.

The weather was not on our side but with the heater and the super cozy blankets we were very warm through the night. Emily really thought of everything, from motion sensor lights to warm robes. It is definitely more of a camping/glamping experience but if you think of something you need it’s probably already there. Also everything has a purpose and there are easy to understand directions for really everything which is amazing to have. The neighborhood was quiet and I only wish I could have stayed longer during a warmer time of year! Will definitely be staying here my next time in New Mexico.

Emily created an amazing place to stay! It was like a little cozy oasis from the chilly weather. She was amazing at communicating and had so many wonderful recommendations for things to do and places to eat!
The yurt in the fall can get pretty cold but the experience is still worth it. You can see the stars and and the morning light through the ceiling! Beautiful!
The yurt was great! It really is cozy, and we had a wonderful time. Emily is a fantastic host, and location is perfect for a lot of different activities. The local grocery store was a blessing!
Such a beautiful little sanctuary. Next time we are in the area we will stay here.
Awesome space to relax and wind down. Hikes with awesome views 15 minutes down the road, and the yurt was super clean!

From the uniqueness of staying in a yurt, to having a great private space to unwind and enjoy being outside, this is an AirBnB worth checking out. Great accommodations too; hot shower, easy access to restroom, comfortable furnishing.

Emily was an amazing host and the YURT was comfortable, cozy and such a fun experience. The communication was great, cool location for local trails, and next to a great restaurant. We loved our stay and will remember with fond memories!

Emily and her family were super welcoming; although we didn’t interact much, she communicated well through the app and offered text/call. The place was super cute and had all the amenities I needed. It would’ve been great to have a refrigerator, but my stay was short, and I didn’t need it. It was a perfect location with many hiking trails, and Los Alamos was nearby. If I am back up that way, I will definitely rebook. I won’t highly recommend it to my colleagues and friends traveling and needing a place to say for their hiking adventures.

Awesome little gem of a hideaway located in the midst of White Rock, with a short hop away to some National monuments and trailheads. Yurt is comfortable with a bunch of how-to's scattered around the place to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Living here is an experience, bringing the outdoors into your living space. Said experience comes with a learning curve as you may be living greener than you may be used to.
If you are in the area, be sure to give this place serious consideration!

We throughly enjoyed our one-night stay in the yurt! It is so beautifully decorated, and the bed is comfy. Emily was great at communicating quickly when we had a question. We’d gladly stay again if we return to the area.

Loved our stay at this yurt. The check in and all necessary instructions for the outdoor shower/bathroom were extremely clear and useful. This Airbnb has a lot of nice small touches and was extremely clean. Our only regret is that we couldn’t stay longer!

Our stay here was incredibly pleasant and comfortable! The yurt feels very private and safe and Emily was a great host! Arriving at the yurt we were immediately enamored by how cute the space is. We were greeted by a little goodie bag and welcome packet with clear instructions on how to operate the amenities and recommendations on local activities. The bed was very comfortable and the outdoor shower got hot very quickly. We were sad to leave and wish we could have stayed longer.
Emily was a fantastic host! The yurt was absolutely perfect. It was cozy and so relaxing. The cherry on top was being able to lay in bed and watch the full moon!
Emily was a great host with excellent communication. We loved our stay in the yurt, it was very comfortable and I loved all of the amenities!
Had such an amazing stay. Emily was very responsive and helpful. We would definitely love to come back one day!
Absolutely amazing!

Absolutely adorable and private. This yurt is glamping at its best! Outdoor shower was hot & refreshing & such a fun experience, the LLBean bath robes make it complete. Emily does not miss a single detail! The little private pathway, the gardens & high end linens. Romantic & exotic vibe. A nice alternative between Taos & Santa Fe. Not many services in White Rock so stop for groceries/gas first.

First and foremost, the hostess deserves all praise and admiration. She asked about our children and specifically included activities and snacks just for them.
The yurt itself is one-of-a-kind and was a highlight of our trip that included staying at two other airBNBs.
The yurt includes a nice “patio” with a grill and fire pit for enjoying the crisp New Mexico evenings.
The interior is well thought out and is an absolute delight for lounging. The neighborhood is quiet enough at all hours to hear the birds singing in the mornings— a peaceful way to start the day.
All in all, 10/10 would stay here again.

So, we didn’t actually get to stay at the yurt (stupid Covid-19) but Emily was so responsive, easy to communicate with and helpful that I wanted to leave her a good review. Anyone who is that quick and helpful must also have amazing accommodations and we look forward to actually staying in the yurt next time we are in the area. It looks super cute and cozy in the pictures.
I loved my stay with Emily! The yurt was so cute and cozy! I was also lucky enough to get rain in the evenings and fall asleep to the rain sounds! Such a unique experience!
Beautiful place and hospitality. Wouldn’t hesitate to ever stay here again if we’re in town!
Comfortable, cozy experience. Lots of privacy, but still attentive hosts.

This was so cute and comfy. Me and my boyfriend came for only one night for our anniversary and it was just what we needed for a Lil weekend get away. we are definitely returning. The lil firepit was my favorite place to hang out. The outdoor shower was surprisingly hot and a must when here.
This was an amazing place to stay. Really pulled out all the amenities needed for a week stay here and very easy to find. Very relaxing.

This is a great location and the way it is set up is more private than you might imagine it being. The yurt is beautiful and very comfortable. What a great atmosphere! The host warned us about the smoke from Cerro Pelado fire days in advance and offered to refund our money if we wanted to cancel, but we stayed anyway and were fine the whole time. Best place we have stayed in a while. I highly recommend it. Easy access to so many great places in northern NM, but also quiet and private.

Glamping experience! A wonderful spot to relax or to use as a home base. I loved not having to drive up from Santa Fe every day to visit family in Los Alamos. The camp shower outside was fun too! Wifi was strong, close to the delicious Pig & Fig cafe. Overall, it was a desert oasis!

Whatever expectations I had were blown out and beyond anything I could have anticipated. Simply gorgeous, serene, beautiful, peaceful and quiet. I always felt hosts were accessible yet respectful of privacy. This is literally an oasis in the desert. I am amazed at how this place is put together. Intricate detail, beauty, serenity.
Emily is a great host had everything ready when arrived! The set up is so cute yet so private we loved our stay with her!

Emily’s place is such a unique experience in a great location!! It was exactly what we needed to reset after several days of tent camping in the southwest.
Although it’s in a neighborhood we still felt like we had plenty of privacy to relax and recharge. We loved the proximity to Bandelier National Monument.
We’ll definitely be back next time we’re traveling through NM.
