Emily's yurt was a comfortable and quiet place to stay while visiting the area. Emily was kind, helpful and available if I needed anything during my stay. The place is also walking distance to a market and the delicious Pig and Fig Cafe. If you plan on visiting the area then I highly recommend staying at Emily's yurt.

Amazing location, one of the cutest Air BNBs ever! Super comfy and a sweet escape away from home. :) hehe hosts are so kind. They had everything we needed inside the yurt. Definitely want to make it back

The yurt is a gem in the mountains. If you’re looking for a cozy getaway with easy access to incredible hikes, Bandelier National Monument, and Santa Fe. The yurt itself is surprisingly large, with the couch and small table. We really enjoyed having access to the fans and the small heater. The little fire pit out back was awesome to wind down the evening. We enjoyed a nice shower and the bathroom was nice and felt private. Emily was a great communicator and we had all the privacy we needed while also knowing she was just a text or call away. Loved the little town of White Rock and enjoyed Emily’s recommendations for food and trails! We can’t wait to come back!

We loved staying in the cozy yurt for our Spring Break getaway! We stayed with our two little girls and our pup. All 5 of us were comfy and cozy. The pull out bed was the most comfortable pull out I have ever slept on! Even though it was Spring Break, it snowed on us, but the little heater kept the yurt nice and toasty:) Our hostess was so accommodating and has done a wonderful job of making the yurt feel like home! It was very clean. It was an experience taking our little girls to use the compostable toilet! They were cold, but we survived! I wanted to try the outdoor shower, but didn’t get a chance because it was below freezing!! But the set up was very nice! Our little dog had a just enough space outside to do her thing. Overall, we had an amazing experience in the cozy yurt and hope to come back again sometime!
Great spot, very cool ambience with a well-lit pathway and beautiful view of the night sky through the skylight window. Me and the dogs had a great, quiet stay!
We love this spot, which is spotless, well located and comfortable. Veronika is an excellent host who is easy to communicate with and very thoughtful.
Extremely clean and great view. Very peaceful area. And Veronika is always there if needed.
Thank you for hosting us; it was a comfortable and efficient place for my purposes for being in Los Alamos.
What a wonderful host and Airbnb! Veronika was very flexible and responsive. We loved our time in Los Alamos - highly recommend this Airbnb!

Veronika’s guest suite was absolutely perfect for our stay in Los Alamos! The mountain and canyon views from the patio were stunning. We loved being close to the neighborhood hiking trails and walking by the deer. The suite was very clean, well-equipped, and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful and relaxing getaway.

Veronika is an AMAZING host! She was friendly and communicative with me and my friends staying at her place. She even introduced us to some delicious Babovka ☺️ Would 100% recommend staying at her place…especially if you enjoy the outdoors!

We had a great stay at Casa Bear! 🐻 Beautiful views and convenient to everything in Los Alamos. Veronika was an awesome host, so responsive, providing wonderful recommendations for things to do, and she even provided two snow discs for my kids to use while we were there! Casa Bear was comfortable with lots of thoughtful amenities like kids toys & games, coffee/tea, bottled water, lotion, lip balm and a welcome cake. Thank you for a wonderful stay. Highly recommend!
Very clean and with thoughtful amenities. Host is very communicative and responsive. Recommended!

Casa Bear is a great place to stay. Veronika was a lovely host, responsive and accommodating. Casa bear has a stunning view just outside the door, the space was clean and we felt right at home. Everything we needed and a few special extras (homemade Babovka cake and water bottles) we will return to this great spot!

I absolutely LOVED staying here! The house was immaculate, cozy, and had all the comforts to make me feel right at home. From extra higiene products and fluffy towels to a fully stocked kitchen and coffee bar, Veronika really went the extra mile. She even included lots of games and brochures of fun activities and places to explore in the area. She recommended some great eateries as well. Everything about the place was great but my favorite thing was the outdoor seating area. I’d go sit out there every morning with a cup of coffee and just take in all the nature and beautiful scenery. Nothing like the smell of pine, the bustling sounds of birds, and the sight of mule deer passing by to really start your day off right! Her place is perfectly located for excursions to the Valles Caldera National Preserve (saw so many elk and a bear!), Jemez Springs, Bandelier National Monument, and let’s not forget Santa Fe. Veronika was the perfect host and I would absolutely stay there again!!!!
A great stay in Los Alamos. Quiet with a super view. Will return in the future.

This is a great little place in a great location. Great hiking area with views a short walk away. The place is very quiet and we did not hear any disturbances from above. My only complaint would be that there’s no air conditioning or temperature control. It cooled at night, but I prefer a cold room at night. Just a heads up if you like your ac!

We LOVED staying at Casa Bear. First of all, the setting is beautiful and peaceful. We drank coffee every morning on the patio listening to the hummingbirds and canyon wrens. The house was probably the cleanest Airbnb I've ever stayed at. The bed was also very comfortable. Last, Veronika has thought about the little things: I forgot to pack lotion and lip balm, which are really helpful in the dry New Mexico air, and Veronika had left a little tube of each in the bathroom for us.
Highly recommend a stay at Casa Bear.

Veronika's Casa Bear is a gold standard among Airbnb's. It is immaculate. It is not cluttered. We had a our own private patio overlooking the canyon. Veronika is a very genuine and warm host. She is responsive and accommodating. We definitely hope to return to Veronika's Casa Bear when we are again in Los Alamos.

We had a magical stay with Veronika and family! Casa Bear is spacious, clean and comfortable. The decor was fabulous, from the southwest furnishings to her phenomenal landscape photography. If you weren’t looking at the amazing view out of the windows, the beauty of the area was on the walls! The outdoor area was well-equipped and we enjoyed being outside watching the wildlife and birds. Veronika and her family were gracious and welcoming, checking in on us during the week but also giving us privacy. We felt right at home and it was hard to leave! We would return in a heartbeat to Casa Bear, and recommended it to others we met on our trip! Thanks for everything, Veronika!
Location was very good especially for the summer intern in LANL. Veronika was easy to reach and she was willing to help me a lot. Thanks!
Lovely and caring family who have a lovely space available that is beyond peaceful. Amazing views of one of the canyons.
Veronika was an excellent communicator and an extremely thoughtful host. She welcomed us with some traditional Czech cake, had little snacks and treats, and we felt very at home there.
This is my 3rd stay at Veronika's and I will be back. Consistently clean, charming, and feels great!
Great canyon and mountains view. It was very clean upon checked in. Veronika was very responsive and recommended lots of great hiking and nature activities.

We had a such a wonderful experience during our stay! There was so much attention to detail in how the place was designed, furnished, and supplied, and we couldn't have asked for better hosts! This is a beautiful spot and we would highly recommend it to others!
Greatvalue. Hosts have exceptional people skills. Would like to stay again. Will easily recommend. Much appreciated.

Casa Bear was a great stay while establishing myself in the Los Alamos area! A private location with a great canyon view, but still very close to LANL. The interior is clean, nicely laid out, and wonderfully decorated. Stunning photographs of local geological features, taken by the host, adorn the brick walls. Speaking of the host, Veronika was lovely to work with. I arrived a little early after a cross-country drive and she immediately helped me get settled. She was very welcoming and maintained contact throughout my stay to ensure I had everything I needed.
I’m locating to the area permanently, so won’t need to book again. But I would not hesitate to recommend Casa Bear to friends and family when they visit! 10 of 10!
Wonderful house and wonderful host. Quick, responsive and very accommodating!

The space was secure, clean, and exactly as advertised. It’s a quiet neighborhood in a quiet town (I live in this neighborhood and stayed here when we had maintenance on our house). Veronika was super helpful and easy to communicate with. I will definitely recommend this place to others!

This place was a gem. Veronika was a great host. If you like quiet, and views and being near wonderful hikes his is the spot for you. We were only two people, but a family of three or four could easily be comfortable here. The bathroom is so nice and big, the table in the eating area was perfect for board games or setting up a laptop to work, and the bedroom was very comfortable. There's a view you can't beat right out the door with a couple of very sweet seating areas including a little enclosed fire pit. We did not have a chance to use it, but we could imagine a long summer night sitting out there curled up and enjoying the sunsets and stars. It's very close to a street called Los Pueblos where you can walk the entire street where each mailbox is decorated with a metal art-animal made by one of the neighbors. SO cool. It's also close to a hike called Deer Trap Mesa and other hikes too. Highly recommend can't wait to come back.

The place was as described with lots of attention to detail and little touches to make it special. The neighborhood essentially located two lots of outdoor activities nearby. The host was responsive to any questions and gave great recommendations for things to do and local hikes.
This rental was perfect for our first visit to Los Alamos and the view was beautiful! Our host Veronika was a gem! We highly recommend this property.
This place is awesome and Veronika and her family are warm and welcoming. This little sanctuary was a great find. Clean and warm with many thoughtful touches!
Location was wonderful, space was fantastic. Host was a delight to work with and extremely responsive. Definitely look to this property again for our next trip to Los Alamos.

Great stay in Los Alamos! Very close to hiking trails and Bandelier National Monument. Veronika was a great host... very attentive to any of our needs. Plenty of room to spread out, cook meals, and even spend some time on the small patio out back.

Far and away one of the nicest and well provisioned Airbnbs we’ve stayed in. The setting is lovely, with views out over a canyon. The Airbnb is a very comfortable private one bedroom place with its own entrance on the lower level of the owner’s home. Veronika provided a drawer of snacks and a Keurig with a full array of drink options in the kitchen area. The bathroom had a great shower with soap, shampoo and conditioner dispensers. Veronika also included sun screen and lip balm for high, dry climate of Los Alamos. We really enjoyed our stay and would stay there again.

What a beautiful spot with a great deal of privacy and heavenly views. So much care and attention to details, with a full slate of amenities in both kitchen and bathroom, including sunscreen and homemade babka. A lighted gravel path helps you find your private entrance at night, and you can sit outside either with or without shade. Special requests are responded to promptly and with grace. Veronica is an excellent host.

We had a very pleasant stay at Veronika's place. It's scenically located just outside the center of Los Alamos, with a direct bus to the lab (where I was working). There was enough space for us and our two kids. The place is nicely decorated (most airbnb's I've stayed at are more basic in that respect) and is well stocked with coffee, tea and snacks. Veronika is quick in communicating and accommodating, providing an air mattress (our kids sleep better in separate beds). I was worried about it getting too hot (there is no AC) but that is not an issue as it is on the ground floor and mostly in the shade.
Veronika is a gracious and accommodating host, excellent communication! This is a quiet neighborhood that is several miles from the main part of town. Could sit outside and watch birds.

This is a great, very private place with plenty of room. The private entrance gives a lot of ease for coming and going and the location is quiet and scenic. It also seems bigger than the listing looked. We would stay again!

Casa Bear is an amazing place to stay in Los Alamos, the view is spectacular! Veronika definitely takes pride in providing her guests with a wonderful stay. We were welcomed with delicious cake. Casa Bear is immaculate, very spacious and beautifully decorated. The bathroom had many travel size toiletries at our disposal. The kitchen is well stocked with lots of coffee choices and many little goodies to enjoy. The outdoor space is perfect to enjoy a beautiful day in Los Alamos.
Veronika touched base with use to make sure all was well with our stay.

Can't recommend this apartment highly enough - it's meticulously clean, newly built so everything is crisp and fresh, beautifully appointed in the Casa Bear theme, has a private feel in the way the entrance and outdoor sitting area is set up, overlooking a sharp ravine. They have set it up with a very nice Weber grill and a high quality fire table, for socializing outside at night. Veronika add lots of personal touches to your stay, making it extra pleasant and welcoming, and is super responsive if anything extra might make your stay a bit better. We've stayed in lots of AirBnB's and this one is on our "must-return" list!
Great place to stay while in Los Alamos. Veronika was very communicative and responsive to our needs. It was a very smooth stay and would definitely stay again.

Had a great stay. Many thoughful touches in this apartment. Really loved having a private entrance with a beautiful outdoor area. Veronika was very responsive and great with communication! Would love to return one day!

My daughter and I come to Los Alamos frequently, and we were able to stay at Veronika's for 10 days. It was such a relaxing and wonderful experience. I couldn't have asked for a more perfect place to stay for that long. The view was spectacular -- what a way to wake up in the morning! The beds were very comfortable and we had all of the amenities that we needed and more. We were surprised with homemade treats when we arrived, which added a touch of warmth to the welcoming. Veronika consistently checked on us throughout our stay via email to see if we were comfortable and needed anything. I would highly recommend staying here. It's definitely a hidden gem in Los Alamos!

Veronika was a great host.
Everything was very clean and the place is just beautiful.
A must stay!!
Thank you Veronika!!!
Excellent place, excellent views, impeccable cleanliness, and great host. Would recommend to a friend.

Veronika accommodated all our needs in timely manner so that we could plan the visit well. Her thoughtful touch and preparation was better than most other super hosts. Even lip balm that we really needed due to the dry weather. I definitely enjoyed the canyon view from the outside table during the dinner. Comfortable bed, nice working desk, spacious place.

Casa Bear was a wonderful experience and exposure to Los Alamos. The apartment space was very welcoming, clean and well maintained. The entry to the space also felt very separate from the rest of the house which gave it a refreshing sense of privacy while still being part of the larger house. I would certainly suggest this space to anyone visiting Los Alamos.
Beautiful views, lovely outdoor space, comfortable accommodations — this place has it all. Veronika went out of her way to make us feel at home.
My experience staying in Veronika's place was extremely great. The place is clean and quite.
A sweet apartment, plenty of room and all the extras one can imagine. very clean and comfortable. about a 6 minute drive from restaurants and shopping. Highly recommended.
Highly recommend. Beautiful view of the mountains, clean and spacious, host had nice personal touches. Wish we could have stayed longer.

The downstairs apartment where we stayed was cozy and well-kept. Veronika was a thoughtful host, leaving snacks and water, not to mention the toiletries including bandaids and an extra toothbrush, which came in handy! We enjoyed the area so much that we stayed an extra night. The location is great for convenient access to hiking at Bandolier and San Antonio Springs as well as downtown Los Alamos. Highly recommend!

We had an excellent experience! The place is super nice, very private and quiet location with beautiful views. The apartment was nicely furnished, everything that we needed was there, including TV streaming services like Netflix, HBOMax and Amazon Prime. The host was very friendly. Highly recommended!
Great views and close proximity to a bunch of national parks/attractions. Even better host, the most kind and accommodating host I've ever had with AirBnB. 100% recommended

This was a lovely, cozy place, and Veronika was very attentive to our needs. Highly recommend this lodging. The front door views were super scenic too. We could not have chosen a better place to stay for several days.

Veronika’s place is the perfect Los Alamos getaway. The views are beautiful. She left snacks, waters, sunscreen, and face wipes for us which was super appreciated! We will highly recommend this place to friends and family.
Really nice place with a beautiful view. Veronika was a great host and super accommodating. Would definitely recommend for a long-term stay.
Very beautiful view, good location and a pretty comfortable house, Veronika's very kind, replies really fast and every detail on the house is really thoughtful.
Recommend this beautiful place 10/10! Veronika was an amazing host and the Airbnb was just beautiful with a great location.

We had a very comfortable stay at the casita with everything we needed for ourselves and the kids. Angel went above and beyond with communication and ensuring we had everything we would need during our stay. We will definitely stay here again when in Los Alamos.

Such an idyllic Casita! Angel was right there when we checked in and was most gracious. Everything was a cut above what was described and more. Huge trees in the yard and behind made for a gentle background ambiance of breezy comfort. Yard fresh eggs were an extra special treat. Truly a special place, unmatched in our travels anywhere. Thank you Angel !!

We really enjoyed our stay at Angel's casita. It's a very nice place and well provisioned. Relaxing on the patio was a treat. I liked the easy access to magical canyon trails and location that's close to downtown Los Alamos.
Angel is the best. She's extremely welcoming, generous and helpful. She has charming chickens with tasty eggs too. We'll be looking forward to staying there again. Thank you Angel.

excellent location. private but close to town. outdoor space was so inviting. the chickens were a delight. Angel knows how to take care of her guests and have them wanting to return. the scenery behind the Casita was fabulous. totally recommend. LynnT

What a wonderful place. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this Airbnb. We were greeted by the host upon arrival. She was friendly and kind. She made gluten-free cookies for my husband, and stocked us with fresh bagels and gluten free bagels, along with additional breakfast items; fresh eggs from her chickens; and beverages. The place was sparkling clean, including the bathroom (which I’m always very picky about!). When we had an issue with the wifi, she responded quickly. Definitely stay here when you visit Los Alamos! Can’t beat it!

This was our second stay at Angel’s Casita and again did not disappoint! We love the quiet and privacy and beautiful canyon views; comfortable beds, clean and well-appointed kitchen and bath, just everything is top notch. Angel is always so responsive and so sweet and we absolutely love the fresh eggs from her hen family aka the Fluffybutt Hut! Four of us were extremely comfortable and the new Serta Hideabed was the most comfortable bed we’ve ever slept on! Thanks for a wonderful stay during a potentially difficult time following the loss of my dear mom. We will be back!

We had a lovely stay at Angel's casita. The location is very peaceful and quiet, yet a very short drive from the downtown area, if you are visiting the Manhattan Project National Historic Park. The casita itself was very spacious and we loved the fact that we could do laundry on-site (which can be really helpful when you are traveling). Finally, thank you for the complimentary eggs and homemade cookies! Highly recommended (and we hope to be back!)

We always enjoy coming to Angel’s place. It is our home away from home while visiting family in the area. We enjoyed our fresh eggs upon arrival and a fully stocked kitchen. Including those little extras that Angel always provides. It is so quiet and peaceful to stay here with amazing views of the canyon and mountains. Angel, thank you for a wonderful stay. See you and your family in the fall!

I can't say enough wonderful things about this listing!!! The location is perfect - access to the mountains/recreational areas is just minutes away. It is PRISTINE, & I honestly don't think I've ever stayed anywhere as spotless and tidy as this casita. The bed was extremely comfortable, with a lovely view of the trees & canyon at the back of the property. Angel is an excellent host who has thought of everything! Some home-baked cookies, fruit & a kind note were waiting for me upon check-in. After a long day of driving and hiking this was most welcome <3 The kitchen was so well stocked that I was able to enjoy several slow mornings drinking coffee & enjoying fresh eggs from her family's beautiful flock. If you have time, ask about meeting them. They are so much fun to interact with! There is a binder full of local recommendations & Angel has plenty more tips should you need them. I am so grateful to have found this listing & look forward to staying here again. Highly recommend!!!
Angel went out of her way to make my stay comfortable!!! Nice touches like fruit, cookies, fresh eggs, juices and cream… very responsive to any questions. Super comfy bed…
Excellent three week stay for a couple. Highly recommended!
Angel is a fantastic host and a great place to stay! Very communicative, kind, attentive and helpful! I’m very thankful for all support, service and help on our stay and trip!

Angel was so kind. The place was clean. Beautiful view of the canyon behind her house. She keeps chickens and let my kids feed and pet them. She taught us all about them! There is a saucer swing and my kids loved that. So easy to get in and out. What a great stay at a great price for Los Alamos! Thank you Angel!
Angel was very helpful, the location was great, and the rental met all our needs

Angel is the friendliest person we’ve ever met! She was so helpful with our needs, and trust me, our needs were complicated! She even babysat our toddler and did the cutest Christmas craft with him for us to have as a keepsake. We enjoyed staying in her cozy, beautiful Casita with a gorgeous view of the canyon. Oh, and she can bake some amazing treats!
Angels place was great and she was a very gracious host! Would love to spend more time at this place!!!
The best Airbnb I’ve stayed at. The place was comfortable, super clean, and in an amazing location. Angel was a 100% awesome host.

Angel,
Thank you so much for being a wonderful host! We enjoyed our fresh eggs and little extras you always provide. We always book Angel’s place when visiting family who live in the area. It is so peaceful, quiet and private with amazing views of the canyon and mountains from the back windows! It’s our home away from home❤️
Thank you,
Patrice and Jim

This place was beautiful, clean, and well stocked. The view of the canyon out the windows of the Casita are not to be missed. There is good parking, and the place is in a nice residential area that is still an easy walk from much of los Alamos. Angel was very accommodating and helpful.

Angel's place was absolutely perfect for me and my two kids! Lots of space, warm and welcoming and cozy with tons of privacy! Would definitely recommend and looking forward to staying here on my next visit!!

Angel’s Casita was perfect for my stay in Los Alamos. It’s quiet, close to trail heads and very comfortable. Angel is very responsive and a gracious host. Every time I visit Los Alamos, Angel’s Casita is tops on my list for a place to stay.

Angel was such a darling host ! She greeted us like family, with such a welcoming smile. Her place was absolutely PERFECT for the location of Los Alamos itself, as well as access to Bandelier, the Valles Caldera, Jemez Springs, Gillman's tunnels and DOZENS of hiking trails - Las Conchas & Deer Trap Mesa being stunning.
The Casita was exactly as pictured , comfy bed - linens - all needed kitchen items for cooking our homemade meals, and a huge bathroom area with laundry capability allowing us to clean clothes and repack for the second wave of our road trip.
Angel stocked the fridge with juice, milk and butter along with some fresh eggs -- with the ADDED treat of homemade cookies and fresh fruit waiting on the table for us after a long day of mountain driving !! We really wished we could have planned to stay LONGER had we only known in advance just how beautiful the area was and how perfect this rental was for our needs !!

Hope to return one day :)

As I sat enjoying a glass of wine and watching the sunset from the courtyard of Angel's Casita, a Taiko drumming ensemble started up in the canyon not far away. In the gathering dusk a string of little lights came on, casting a soft glow across the courtyard. "This - this is perfect," I thought to myself.
The Casita itself is lovely, with clerestory windows, nice furnishings, a comfortable bed, a well-equipped kitchen, and a huge, immaculate bathroom with an alcove containing a washer and dryer.
Angel is a friendly, thoughtful, and very helpful host. She has created a beautiful place overlooking a wooded canyon. If you're planning a trip anywhere near Los Alamos and need a place to stay, do yourself a favor and reserve Angel's Casita.

The Casita was perfect for our two-night stay. The house was very clean, more spacious than anticipated, and stocked with everything we needed. We very much appreciated Angel, who was friendly, communicative, and flexible. The neighborhood was quiet and felt very safe. We would definitely stay there again!

This is such a nice casita! I'll definitely stay here again the next time I need to overnight in Los Alamos. The entire Casita in a great location; nice amenities; great hosts; and all this for less than the cost of a local hotel room; PLUS fresh eggs from the chickens. Very Nice!

Angel is the nicest, kindest host ever! We felt very welcome and at home in the casita at the bottom of their garden.
The space is light and airy with high ceilings, and felt private, being well screened off from the main garden, with Ponderosa pine forests and a canyon on the other side.
We arrived to fresh eggs from the "fluffy butt hut", peaches from the tree, and home-baked cookies. The facilities were great - decent knives and pans, unscented laundry detergent, breakfast provisions, extra blankets, closet space etc.
We really liked the location. It is in a quiet and safe residential area between two canyons, but also fairly central to the attractions of Los Alamos. It is a 20 minute walk (half via canyon trails) or a 5 minute drive to the historical district.

Angel was very good host. So kind and so accommodating. The treat and breakfast items were so great! The eggs in particular were soooooo amazing!!
Thank you so much!
We look forward to staying with you again!

We had a very enjoyable stay in Los Alamos. Spent a couple of days in Santa Fe and a day touring the sites in town. Angel was very welcoming, couldn't have been nicer! We really appreciated the food items offered, especially the cookies. It was unexpected. The Casita was very private and had everything one would need for a short term, or even longer term stay. We hope to visit again!
Just a great experience all around

Angel excels at the art of hosting, by doing it with love and real care!
I felt happy and peaceful at the beautiful Casita, which had everything I needed for my comfortable stay.
I also loved the view to the canyon. I like nature and I just started to explore the trails and places in Los Alamos region, which are very beautiful!
I definetely look forward to staying there again at the Casita del Cielo! Thank you very much for providing this space!

The best stay in Los Alamos I have had! Angel was a wonderful host, we loved the fresh eggs, baked goods and beautifully decorated casita.
She had coffee, creamer, fruit and other additional kitchen essentials for us that were very much appreciated. She was always very responsive and accommodating. It only took her 20 minutes to bring us an HDMI cable so we could have a movie night.
Thank you for everything Angel!

Angel,
Thank you for being such a great host. This was our second time here, and we will definitely be back. We enjoyed our fresh eggs, and the little extras that you provided. Our family is here in the area, and this place made us feel like we where home.
Patrice and Jim
Great host and very quiet and comfortable space with wonderful views. Especially loved the fresh eggs and homemade goodies! Super accommodating with flexible check-in / check-out.
Fantastic host and beautiful location !

Travelled to Los Alamos for a buisness trip and Angel's airbnb provided everything needed for a comfort stay. Angel was very helpful especially during the sudden snowfall and quick to respond to questions/requests. The apparment was clean, tidy and provided eveything needed including breakfast.
Highly recommend to stay at Angel's airbnb.
Lovely, spacious casita with any amenity you can think of. We appreciated the variety of coffees and breakfast items. Zoned heating and super comfy bed. Loved the shower head! Would stay again.
We thoroughly enjoyed our time in Los Alamos. Our visit was made even better by staying at "The Casita". Thank you, Angel!

Angel is a gracious host and incredibly generous and thoughtful. The fridge and cupboards were conveniently stocked with essential items. The casita was an ideal size for two and very comfortable. It was the perfect location for a ski weekend and the backyard view was serene and lovely. We will definitely be making our way back at some point.

We appreciated Angel’s responsiveness to our questions about the area and apprehension about the winter weather. She was very accommodating and a great hostess. The casita is set in back of the lot with breathtaking views of the canyon. We were warm and comfy and felt very welcome.

It was our second time at the Casita. It was just as marvelous as the first time. Angel is absolutely lovely, the location is absolutely fantastic, and the Casita is absolutely cozy. We will definitely come back!
We had a wonderful stay at Angel’s casita as a family with little kids! Would love to come back. Bonus: She even made a date night possible for us, which was lovely. Thank you for everything!

Angels Casita has all the amenities you need away from home. We stayed a week and had everything we could need. It being Los Alamos there are a lot of hiking trails just outside near the Casita. Angel was very nice and responsive. We loved our stay and will definitely plan to stay at the Casita in future.

Very gracious and thoughtful host. All was as indicated and more, with fresh eggs! Lovely stay and can walk to shuttle or drive to places in town. Trail nearby and though in town, peaceful and beautiful.
Great place to stay!

Angel was the perfect host for our family during our stay. She kept in touch with us, seeing how we were doing and if any little extras were needed. Before we arrived she had stocked the kitchen with lots of yummy breakfast items, and also fresh eggs from her chickens in her backyard. Angel definitely went out of our her way to make us feel welcome, like we were at our own home for the week. We are coming back very soon!

One of the best airbnbs I've stayed in!
Angel was an amazing host. She answered all of our questions and provided suggestions for good hiking and places to eat and see nearby. We couldn't have asked for a better stay and was much better than any hotel stay we could've booked. There were personal touches that made the stay that much better.
The airbnb was clean, well maintained, and cozy. It's located in a convenient location for many hiking trails just around the home and ~30 mins from other great trails like those at Bandelier National Monument. Other things like Jemez hot springs and Santa Fe aren't too far either.
Highly recommend booking your stay here as you won't be disappointed!

Can’t say enough nice things!! Lovely property that was maintained and gave you a comfortable and personal feel. Very welcoming people. Nice neighborhood right in town with beautiful outdoor scenery surrounding it. The host was even kind enough to include a lovely breakfast spread for us. Highly recommend!
Quiet and private accommodation in Los Alamos, NM convenient to many popular tourist attractions in northern New Mexico.
What a lovely home Angel has created . Wonderful location and so well supplied with anything you would need . We felt so welcomed by Angel !
What a nice set up and extremely nice place. Angel is a super super host. I look forward to my next stay with Angel.

Angel's place was absolutely perfect for us. It was amazingly clean, private and had everything we needed, plus many personal touches of things we had no idea we would need, but appreciated that they were there...like a bathrobe and half n half in the fridge as well as the ability to make ice, cook our own meals, and do laundry.
Angel is a sweet and kind host and if you want local knowledge, she is happy to provide it. We took her advice on conquering Bandalier and some smaller local hikes, which made for two great days. Don't underestimate Los Alamos as it is rich with history and hiking. The bed was comfy, the patio was great and the views from the Casita are fantastic.
This is an absolutely delightful stay. So comfortable, pretty, and peaceful. Excellent attention to detail, and Angel has a true gift for hospitality.

Our stay at Angel's Casita was a wonderful experience. The Casita itself is lovely, clean, comfortable and outfitted with everything we could want for our 4-night stay. I appreciated details like a good selection of pots and pans, a washer/dryer, and even a hair dryer and curling iron. Angel was tremendously gracious and helpful, answering our questions about hiking near Los Alamos and providing a generous assortment of breakfast items. We would definitely stay here again !

This lovely casita is perfect! Angel has truly thought of EVERYTHING! The neighborhood is beautiful, the views from the bedroom and kitchen windows stunning, and the location is central to all that the Los Alamos area has to offer (Bandelier, Valles Caldera, Santa Fe, etc). We wanted for nothing and were pampered with fresh cookies and fruit upon arrival, bath robes, fresh chicken eggs, oh-so-comfortable beds, a fully stocked kitchen for meal prep, and an enclosed private patio filled with potted flowers... the list goes on. Highly recommend!
Very nice casita
Awesome place! Angel is such an accommodating host!

Angel's place is lovely. Was a perfect fit. Close to everywhere we needed to be in Los Alamos and surrounding area. Super clean. We loved the attention to detail and the farm fresh eggs. Five of Five stars! We'd definitely stay here again!
We loved it!
Wonderful host and very comfortable accommodations! We highly recommend it!!

a lovely stay in a clean well presented cottage.
Angel was very welcoming and was a pleasure to deal with.
lovely aspect to the rear of the property and a nice neighbourhood.
excellent person and excellent house
Angel makes you feel at home, and goes above and beyond to ensure a smooth stay.

Angel is the most gracious of hosts who has gone over and beyond to make the Casita very special. It is centrally located, yet quiet and peaceful with beautiful surrounding. Angel has set everything up perfectly, cozy and clean with all the comforts of home. The space is perfect for long or short stays and well suited for work and leisure travel. Don’t hesitate to book Angel’s Casita!

Our stay at Casita de Cielo was fantastic! Hostess Angel provided us with everything we needed to make our stay pleasant and memorable. Beyond the cute private cottage overlooking a tree-lined canyon, she provided us fresh eggs from her hens, greeted us with fresh chocolate chip cookies, fridge stocked with dairy and breakfast items, a stocked K-cup coffeemaker and luxurious bath complete with full sized tub and rain shower head all combined for unbeatable comfort and value. Memory foam toppers for the beds made for easy sleeping! She was super accommodating of our party of four adults and a baby, and even provided high chair, Pack n Play and toys for our nine month old grandson. Five stars all the way through; you can’t miss with the Casita, if you can find an opening! We will be back!

Angel’s Casita is wonderfully light and warm and overlooks a gorgeous canyon with pine trees. The canyon rim glows red at sunrise. The stars twinkle at night.
Angel has the gift of hospitality. There was a large supply of coffee pods, fresh eggs from her hens, and she even baked us cookies. I didn’t expect to feel sooo welcome. Stay here… it’s beautiful and close to everything!

Staying with Angel was a great experience, hands down the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in! Her hospitality is unparalleled, we enjoyed excellent breakfast food each day, and the casita was quiet, relaxing, and easily accessible.

This is the second time I have stayed at this Casita, and it truly is a gem. Angel is a perfect hostess with offerings of warmth and generosity with her homemade cookies, fresh eggs and delicious fruit! I travel often, and when I do, my two objectives are to find a place with comfortable beds and a quiet environment. This place offers both and much much more. My favorite time of day is looking out of the window in the morning when the sun hits the mountains across the canyon. It is just so magical and beautiful. I highly recommend staying here. It will not disappoint!
We all would love to live in your casita permanently. Your decor is great, the design is great as well. I will recommend your place to everyone I know. That’s a million.

Super host! Angel is truly an angel! Her casita is nestled behind the main house but is very private, extremely clean, cozy and comfy with everything you need. Angel is extremely helpful, thoughtful and knowledgeable about the area. She provided fresh eggs from her chickens at the Fluffbutt Hut next door. The casita has amazing views of the wooded canyon rim where we saw mule deer and other wildlife walking by the windows. Our family plans on going back one day.
Staying here was amazing. The personal touches made me feel welcome and right at home. So excited that I found this treasure!

Angel is a great host. She was there at the front to greet us as we arrived late in the evening and ensured we were settled in comfortably. She even made wonderful eggless cookies as we are vegetarian. The place is clean and well kept.

What an amazing place! It is located right next to the Pajarito Ski area, just a 15 minutes drive. It truly felt like home, with all the nice details that Angel had for us, from fresh harvest eggs, to mini home-made cheesecakes! We loved our stay and fell in love with the Canyon view we had, a magic spot that will stay with us forever.

Angel is an amazing host and quick to respond to inquiries. The casita was easy to find, was super clean and comfy! Angel added extra touches that made our stay memorable! We arrived to find home baked cookies w/a cute welcome note, bagels, fresh eggs from her chickens other goodies she included like cereal and lemonade! We had a late arrival and Angel made sure we walked in to a warm casita with the lights on! I'd definitely rent this spot again when I'm in town!
Angel was extremely kind and warm; she is beyond superhost. The Casita was very cosy, well located and well equipped. In a nutshell, the perfect place for our stay in Los Alamos.

Big space for the money. The bathroom is super spacious too and the showerhead is fantastic. Breakfast bagels and cereal and whole milk were provided along with breakfast bars and tea and bananas and apples. Saved a lot of money on breakfast for sure making this an even better value than it already is. And it's super clean. Youtube and netflix are provided too. Just a super place to stay if you've got business in LA. Angel will tailor make it to your pleasure.

The place was really great ! Great location with great views from the windows. Angel was an amazing host ; excellent with communication and making sure we are comfortable and got everything you need. My family and I had a great time !

Angel’s casita was a perfect stay for our vacation in NM. The location is near Valle Calderas which is highly recommended for scenic views and for a quick dip in the Jemez hot springs. Angel is a great host and made our stay very comfortable. The well stocked fridge was a nice touch. She was very communicative during our stay and kept us informed of changing weather conditions. We definitely will be staying here again.
Great stay at Angel’s place. Comfortable accommodations, good communication, and thoughtful touches like breakfast items including fresh eggs from her own chickens. Recommended!
A perfect and cozy spot to stay while on a business trip in Los Alamos! Angel is a wonderful host!

I've often had very positive experiences with AirBnB hosts, and yet our visit to Angel's casita set new standards for fabulous hosting. The charming house behind the main house was perfect for us (2 adults, a 3 and a 6 year old). Angel had thought along with us about perfect sleeping arrangements for the little ones and the house was in perfect condition upon arrival. Everything we needed was there, including a laundry machine and a dryer. Angel checked in with us via texts and several times provided delicious food and snacks. It was absolutely amazing! Extremely warmly recommended.
This was my second stay - even more comfortable than the first. The cottage is very light and comfortable. The goodies and breakfast items add a welcoming touch.
Loved this casita! Angel is a great host. The location is close to trails for hiking and running. Very peaceful and quiet.

Charming, quiet, well-provisioned casita in walking distance to the historic town center. Angel was on hand to greet us and immediately provided us with recommendations for several hikes. We also appreciated the well-stocked fridge and bathroom - everything one could need was available. Truly a home away from home!

This property was awesome!!! Everything was perfect for our weekend get away. Angel thought of everything. The casita was comfortable and just what we needed to relax. HIGHLY RECOMMEND this property!!!
Lovely, comfortable casita. Angel is a wonderful host.
Very comfortable and lovely host!

I can't imagine a better play to stay in Los Alamos. Angel has provided everything you could possibly need for a comfortable stay. On top of that she's a great host and gave us tips on the best restaurants and hikes in the area. If you're lucky enough to find Angel's place open when you're in the area book it before someone else does.

Angel's casita fit our family of four's needs in every way. Everything was in great condition and spotlessly clean - something I can't say about every place I've stayed in! The place felt warm and inviting from the moment we stepped in the door. Angel is a very gracious host and we felt lovingly welcomed. :-)

Angel's place is one of the loveliest we've stayed in and we travel a lot. She has excellent taste and includes so many little high quality and healthy comforts. The space worked well for our group of 3 adults. We made good use of the kitchen and appreciated the fresh eggs from Angel's hens as well as her yummy home-baked cookies. After 2 weeks of camping, it was a pleasure to pamper ourselves in her sumptuous bathroom and be able to wash our clothes. Los Alamos is built on a mesa top riven with canyons and Angel's casita is very near a canyon rim trail system that is an incredible escape into another world. Don't miss it!

Angel and her place are amazing! Great conversations, and the place has a nice view of the canyon. She shared fresh tomatoes from her garden, there were two delicious cookies waiting for us on arrival and it was so fun feeding her chickens. We would love to come back and stay again!
Comfortable, quiet, very clean, convenient. What more could you ask for? A wonderful host, fresh eggs, homemade muffins? You’ve got it.

I had a wonderful stay! Angle is a super nice and a very generous host, she happily introduced me to her chickens and patiently answered all of my chicken related questions . She was also extremely generous with recommending places to explore in the area forwarding me links to places I was interested in which was very helpful. The space is the best Airbnb I have stayed in. Angel has provided many lovely and practical touches to make it feel like home. I highly recommend!

In have not done enough Air BnB trips to tell you Angel is the best host they have, but I am fairly confident they have none better. I can't imagine how any human could have improved upon how she hosted us.

Angel is a very considerate and well organized host. We really enjoyed our stay - quiet and relaxing with more than everything we needed at the seperate cottage. We visited in August and really enjoyed hiking around the area then coming back to a clean and comfy place to relax. Angel shared her cookies, fruit, veggies, and fresh eggs! highly recommended place to stay in Los Alamos.

Angel's place was fantastic, probably one of the best places I've stayed in airbnbing. She's quick to respond, very sweet to talk to and offers an amazing stay in Los Alamos. Everything was clean, spacious and very comfortable. I'd definitely suggest staying there and I'd love to stay again if I find myself back in town.

The most amazing Airbnb experience to date. Lovely casita on the top of a gorge with fresh air and quiet 24 hours. Every amenity and such a sweet hostess, made this one of our lifetimes most memorable visits.

This was a great place to stay while visiting family in the area. Check-in instructions were clear and easy to follow. The casita was very comfortable, clean, and welcoming. The bed was comfortable and the kitchen was well-stocked including a nice selection of breakfast items. Angel was very welcoming and responsive. It was the perfect place to relax and rewind during my stay!
This was our first time staying at an Air B&B and we couldn’t have asked for a better start. Thank you so much, we will remember our trip fondly!

The casita was an absolute dream! Beautiful, comfy and spotlessly clean, and the perfect location! Angel was an amazing host— she was extremely responsive and welcomed us with fresh baked cookies and fresh eggs from her own flock of chickens! She provided everything you could possibly need— including all sorts of goodies in the pantry and every pan and utensil you could need. Our family of 4 loved the view overlooking the canyon, hiking the canyon to downtown, hanging out and watching the chickens, and lazy naps during afternoon rain showers. One of the best AirBnB experiences we’ve ever had— we will definitely be back!

This is the perfect place to stay in Los Alamos. The Casita de Cielo really lives up to its name.
We left early in the morning and came back in the evening, but Angel was available for whatever we needed. Angel’s communication is very good and her family is great.
Canyon hiking right out back; a great spot with short access to everything there is to see in the area; and there is a lot to see! She also includes suggested activities and dining in the guest packet.
The Casita is very clean, and the beds are really comfortable. Everything you need is there.
Choose this one!

Angel was an incredible host, and her home was perfect for our family. Everything was exactly as described, perfect accommodations for a family of four, beautiful scenery with canyons and hiking trails all around us. While I would highly recommend Angel’s home with or without children, it was absolutely a great choice for traveling with our kids. They got to meet Angel’s chickens, swing in the trees, and explore the playground down the street!

A friend for over 40 years and I have found ourselves in separate states. We met to catch up and also get a much needed R&R. This was a great place. We felt very safe. It is clean and comfortable. We both slept well. The kitchen accommodated our ability to prepare "old favorite" dishes.
The view out our back windows is lovely and peaceful. We could hear the chickens, but they were apart of the peaceful environment. We also enjoyed our fresh eggs.
It is 5 minutes from downtown Los Alamos, but our place was private.

We had a wonderful stay and Angel is an amazing host. The casita was very clean and well stocked. Angel even provided us with fresh eggs from her chickens and home baked chocolate chip cookies upon our arrival! She really goes above and beyond to make your stay great. Communication was also excellent. I would highly recommend staying here if you are visiting the Los Alamos area.

There are many things that I enjoyed about staying in Angel's Casita. The pictures on the AirBnb website do not do this place justice. It's located on the edge of a canyon, tucked privately behind the front house. My favorite part of my stay (besides the COMFORTABLE beds and amenities) was listening to the coyotes howl in the canyon in the evenings. I felt very far away from the hustle and bustle of life and was able to relax completely. I travel to Los Alamos frequently, and I will be sure to check to see if Angel's place is available from here on out. I highly recommend staying here!!

Wonderful Casita that had everything we required. Wifi was good as we worked a few days while there. Communication and help was excellent. Quiet residential street but you could hear the coyotes in the canyon behind the house at night, which was cool. Highly recommended!

Angel and her beautiful home are both Airbnb gems. This is one of the best stocked vacation rentals you will ever find. Angel has gone above and beyond in her accommodation of guests; providing coffee, snacks, breakfast foods, and toiletries.
The property itself is incredibly scenic. Your backyard view is a natural canyon landscape with deer, if you’re lucky. Her gorgeous chickens are there to greet you in the morning. There are several good food places close by and best of all, you’re situated close to two incredible national monuments. All in all, this was one of our favorite Airbnb properties amongst many, and we hope to return someday.

This is a great place to stay whether your in Los Alamos for a few days or and extended stay. Angel was wonderful to communicate with and took steps to make our stay extra comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful private place, great location, clean, beautiful!
Everything you need in a great location. Angel is a very accommodating host and attentive to details. I’d like to keep this place a secret.

If you have the opportunity to stay at the Casita, please do! This host is not only super clean and professional, but also adds thoughtful touches that really go above and beyond. Great location with a fantastic view, and the most comfortable air bnb beds I’ve had the pleasure of sleeping on.

If you are able to stay here, you are so lucky to find this gem. Angel is an amazing, warm and thoughtful host. She covers every detail - even things you may not think of like a shower cap or ear plugs. The kitchen was stocked so well - even with fresh eggs from her chickens just outside the casita. The bed was lovely and the shower was glorious!
The sitting area outside the casita is wonderful - nature surrounds you! We saw many deer and the birds sang beautifully. Also, her beautiful and unique chickens were friendly and inquiring - we loved them.
I cannot more highly recommend a stay at Angel’s casita. I cannot wait to return!

Amenities and special touches made this little place homey. Bed was comfy and rooms were spacious. Once Angel adds additional seating it will be over the top. It was a bit chilly this stay, otherwise we would have used the relaxing and peaceful patio more. We loved watching the deer along the canyon. Close to food and trails.

The casita is very private and very comfortable. Angel provide so many extras to make our stay special. The canyon views are beautiful and we saw many deer. The hiking trails are nearby and you can walk for hours with amazing views. The location is close to shopping and downtown. We will definitely be making this our Los Alamos accommodation when we visit. Just hope it’s available!

This Casita was wonderful. It had a good bed, a big bathroom, great Wifi, and a well stocked kitchen area. Angel keeps chickens too and gave us fresh eggs, along with fruit, milk, cereal, coffee and other snacks. The Casita is at the back of their property so it is very private and when you look out your bedroom window you are in a pine forest. We saw deer and even a coyote one morning. At the front of the Casita there is a private patio with nice furniture. We have stayed in a number of Air B&Bs over the years and Angel is probably the most considerate host we have ever come across. We highly recommend this Casita and Angel and hope we will be able to stay there again the next time we are in Los Alamos.

We spent here a few days and we got everything we expected, actually got a lot more! The place is clean and cozy and provided everything we needed. We cook a lot and there was everything. But there was a lot more - snacks which my kids explored really quickly and ate all (sorry Angel). But also everyday "breakfast stuff" too, from butter, milk, juice and more. This was great that most of the things we forgot to buy were in our fridge ready for us. Kids really liked fresh made cookies. I must highlight Angel, our host, always warm welcome and asking if need anything, providing always something above. We enjoyed fresh eggs from their chickens (and even got resupply because we loved it). Our kids cried when we leaved, because they talked to the chickens every day. Did I mention that we had a close observation of deers right from our bedroom and kitchen? this was awesome! This place is nice, cozy, reasonably priced but the host Angel makes it few steps above. Will return or recommend to my friends. Thank you!

Angel's Casita is a perfect home away from home. It has everything you need, including breakfast treats! If I could rate it above 5 I would. It is in the perfect setting, close to town but nestled next to a canyon with spectacular views and wildlife. Angel makes sure the home is sanitized and clean and provided cookies upon our arrival. I stayed with my son who was relocating to Los Alamos. Angel made us feel welcomed, connected with my son after I left as he forgot something and offered to help if we needed anything. She is wonderful and I highly recommend staying at this Casita if you are in the area. Also Bandilier National Monument is a must!

I feel that their description does not do this beautiful little place justice! This little casita is tucked away on a canyon behind the host home. The kids were able to hike and sled back there and we saw tons of deer from our window. To top it off, Angel is so well prepared and hospitable that you want for nothing! 10-15 minutes from Bandelier and Parajito too!

This was our second stay at Angel's place and we were very happy to go back! Our kids were excited to see their deer friends again stroll and lay in the canyon as they gazed out the back windows. A couple snow storms blew thru during our stay, which added to the natural beauty surrounding the casita. There is plenty of heating with the baseboard heaters inside and Angel was very courteous to keep the path clear of snow while making sure we could get out of the driveway if need be. She even let us know where the kids could sled on a nearby hill and let us borrow some sleds. Baked goodies and fresh fruit are provided as an added bonus while staying. I would recommend anyone make arrangements with Angel if staying near Los Alamos!

Casita de Cielo in Los Alamos is a perfect home when you're not home!
Our recent relocation to New Mexico led us to Angel's casita while our house was finishing construction in the area. It had everything we needed as a family of 5 with cozy sleeping accommodations, a great tub / shower combo, all the kitchen supplies necessary, and the most amazing views of the natural surroundings. Our kids adopted a family of deer that lived behind the casita above the gorgeous canyon view and watched them with wonder thru the windows. Angel's chicken coop also gave the kids a new experience that they loved as they got to interact with their new winged friends. The location to all the main parts of Los Alamos was also very convenient for us and the scenic, smooth 40 minute drive to Santa Fe is beautiful. Angel and her family were very welcoming and always prompt to address any questions or issues. Be sure to book this casita when you're in the area and if it's available!

The casita was perfect for my mom and I. We were comfortable with the one bedroom and twin bed in the living area. Angel was a great host. We enjoyed peace and quiet at her casita. We were not lacking for anything. The kitchen was stocked with everything we needed and more! Highly recommended!

Angel is an amazing host - one of the very best Airbnb's ever. She went above and beyond to be kind (she shared her baby chicks with my little kids, she baked fresh cookies for our first night, she set out toddler plates and booster seat for us, and much more). The place is a great location, has an open bathroom, feels very private and clean, and has a well-stocked kitchen. Lots of nice "extras" like extra pillows, breakfast, parking spot, smart TV, and so on. Overall, just a really comfortable, perfect place!

My family and I have stayed in so many airbnb’s and Angel’s casita is up there with the best. It has def. been one of the cleanest places we have stayed in. She is also an amazing host and goes above and beyond to make sure you have what you need! If you are ever in Los Alamos, please do yourself a favor and book with Angel. You will not regret it! We will def. be back again! :)
Great customer services

Angel’s Casita de Cielo is a relaxing oasis in the beautiful town of Los Alamos. The Casita is situated in Angel’s back yard among Ponderosa Pine trees and provides a peaceful retreat where you can watch wildlife right from the back windows! The bedroom was comfortable and quiet. The living/dining space has a comfortable pull out sofa, and Angel set up an additional portable twin bed so that my teenage kids didn’t have to share a bed - which they both appreciated! Even with both beds out, the living space was comfortable and roomy. Angel stocked the little kitchenette with eggs, milk, cereal, frozen pizza, etc. which made it so nice and easy to get the day started - or to just have something quick and easy in the evening. With all the little touches Angel has provided - food, board games, books, bathrobes - and easy hiking trails close by, it would be easy to just relax and enjoy, without ever having to venture out! Although, Los Alamos is a great town and the Jemez Mountains and northern New Mexico has so much culture and beauty to offer - it really is worth an excursion or two.
Angel is a fantastic and thoughtful host and we hope to return to the Casita de Cielo on future visits to Los Alamos!
I have stayed here several times now because angel is such a great host and the casita is an amazing get away!

Our family of four came to stay at Angel’s casita in July and fell in love with Los Alamos, the casita and Angel and her family. The casita was perfectly situated facing pine trees and trails. We have seen deer out of our window every single day. The amenities were perfect for us. Comfy beds, kitchen with all necessities, bathroom with the shower that had an exceptional water pressure and even washer and dryer. Angel even provided some breakfast items! She was also incredibly responsive to my numerous questions and was a valuable resource to local trails and places to visit. Our car broke down once we got to Los Alamos and Angel had generously offered us to borrow her car to drive to the car rental place while our car was in the shop. How many strangers would do that? Just incredible family! We all highly recommend Angel as a host and the casita as a place to stay in Los Alamos. We are looking forward to our next trip perhaps in the Fall or Winter to enjoy different side of beautiful Los Alamos.

I cannot begin to describe what a wonderful stay we had at Angel’s Casita. Our family stays at a lot of Airbnb rentals and sometimes the house is what makes it special and sometimes the host is what makes it special. In this case, both the house and the host made it exceptionally special. If you like looking out the window of your bedroom and living room and seeing a giant canyon with mule deer walking by, that is what you will find. The location is very close to everything and you can access hiking trails through the back door. Angel constantly made our stay so wonderful by checking in with us and even giving my daughter a birthday present as that is what we were celebrating on this vacation. She is truly one of the kindest people you’ll ever meet! I cannot wait to return for another stay.

This was my second time staying at angels place. It was just as great as the first time. She goes out of her way to make sure you have the things you need for your stay. She even had the fridge stocked with breakfast items and milk. I will be staying here again if it is available.
A perfect little casita, in an awesome location. Angel went above and beyond in every aspect of our stay. If it's available- book it!

The casita had absolutely everything we needed for a perfect stay and even some fresh food for breakfast. Angel and Russell are so sweet and friendly, couldn’t ask for better hosts! The beds are incredibly comfortable and there are gorgeous hiking trails right in the back yard. I can’t wait to visit los Alamos and this casita again!

We stayed here for a few days during our transition out of town. It was a neat and cozy place to stay while in between homes. The canyon views were gorgeous and we even saw some deer snacking outside the window one morning! Angel was very gracious and was eager to meet any needs we had. I would recommend staying here.

This is a lovely hidden gem with everything you need to enjoy your stay in Los Alamos. I recommend this home to anyone visiting the area and in need of a cute place with a wonderful view of nature!!
Will definitely keep her place on my list for Airbnb's to stay at in the future!
This is an awesome place with a great host. We enjoyed being able to walk out the back gate and take off hiking. Perfect location for work at the labs.

Angel's place was perfect for our family of four. It is located in a beautifully wooded area, but still in the middle of town close to everything. Angel provides many breakfast items for you to prepare during your stay. It is very clean, well lit, and has everything you need for a vacation stay. Angel is an excellent host and goes out of her way to make sure your stay is comfortable.

We stayed in Angel's casita for our first 2 months in Los Alamos after moving across the country. When we arrived the house was stocked with everything we needed and we were quickly able to make the casita into our new home. Angel and her family were very kind and welcoming. I highly recommend this house to all visitors, whether you stay a weekend or 2 months.

A very well-appointed casita! It has everything you will ever possibly need for a visit. Angel is an awesome hostess, and has some toiletry items in case you forget them. The casita is also gorgeous, spacious, and sometimes you can see some local fauna bounding over the hills in the back woods. Highly recommended!
Great location with an even better host. Can’t go wrong with this one.

Definitely worth it. We enjoyed our stay. We are taking a scenic route from Fort Worth, Texas to Colorado Springs, Colorado. We arrived very late so I didn’t get to fully take in the environment. I woke up with sun shining through the window and amazing view. There was a local hiking park (4 mins away) that my kids and I went to right after I made breakfast with the food provided in their kitchen. We came back showered up and got going. Definitely will come back if we are in the area again.

Angel is an amazing host. Thoughtful and kind, she made our stay very special. The space is clean and very comfortable. The casita is set in a quiet and peaceful spot with canyon and wildlife in the backyard. Our family thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

We are so lucky staying here and it really made us feelings like staying home. The room is larger than the photos showed. Everything is organized well. Angel is so nice supplied us with delicious homemade cookies. Even the breakfast is organic!! It is the best Airbnb experience I have ever had.
What an outstanding place to stay an such an amazing host! Thanks Angel for being flexible and accommodating!!
Another great stay at Angel's casita! I enjoy the hominess here and will certainly stay here again as I'm frequently in Los Alamos for work.

Our stay with Angel was amazing. The casita is even better than pictured and very well equipped. On Thanksgiving morning Angel made us homemade cinnamon rolls and also made sure that we had warm cookies on the day we left. The location is great, views are beautiful, and anything and everything we could ever need was provided (even robes in the bathroom)!Needless to say, we will be back at our first opportunity.
A lot of thoughtful touches and very comfortable.

Very cute and comfortable spaces, lots of thoughtful touches. I've stayed at 3 Airbnbs in Los Alamos and this one might be my favorite. I arrived late, but was still able to find it in the dark with Angel's detailed instructions. The view out the back windows the next morning was gorgeous.
I had a lovely stay! It was absolutely perfect; clean space, breakfast in the morning, and beautiful views of the canyon. I couldn’t have asked for more.
Great little hideaway close to Los Alamos and several of the national sites.

I booked this for my family's first visit to NM. They had everything they needed and Angel was such a hospitably host. She swept snow off the path, ensured good lighting to the guest house, brought over homemade treats, and since they were staying around Halloween, my family got to enjoy their own illuminated carved pumpkin.
I loved it id love to go back again

As always, Angel and her family were amazing hosts and everything was perfect. My family and I always look forward to staying at the Casita del Cielo and we greatly appreciate Angel's kindness, attention to detail and hospitality. It is a wonderful place for anyone looking to spend a few days in Los Alamos!

Angel was a great hostess, she was very nice and accommodating. The house was nice and clean, with woods in the back and a very quiet location. We only stayed one night, but wish we could have stayed longer.
Great accommodations in a great setting.
Wonderful stay at Angel's, just wish we had been able to stay longer. Thoughtful space, great location, super comfortable beds. Angel is a very attentive host, highly recommended!
We highly recommend this place. It's a comfortable and convenient location with great hosts.

My sisters and I stayed at Casita de Cielo for 4 nights and the comfortable accommodations and gracious hostess made the trip incredibly special. The Casita was clean and bright with many small stylish touches. We were welcomed with fresh cookies and celebratory beverages, the beds were very comfortable, the breakfast items in the fridge were perfect (including homemade jam), and the washer and dryer came in handy. Angel answered our questions promptly or, in most cases, anticipated them which was very helpful. The entire experience could not have been better! Thank you so much, Angel!
Lovely view and comfortable space. Angel thought of everything - the breakfast food is really nice. I would love to return to this one.

Expect to be treated well! This is a gem in the Airbnb world!! Lots of extras and super clean.
Angel and her family are very special!
Hard pressed to see how it could have been any better. We will hope to stay again if we find ourselves in Los Alamos area in the future.

One of the best air B&Bs we've ever stayed at. Lovely private cottage, with every amenity we needed. Beautiful view of the pine forest. Very quiet, extremely clean. Well stocked with awesome selection of breakfast foods. Hostess was so helpful. We were grateful to be able to do our laundry there. Would love to go back. Local hiking trails were beautiful.

Angels place was wonderful and full of every single thing necessary, as well as so many extra touches. If we’re back in the area there will be no hesitation for us in staying at her place again. Cannot give her enough accolades for all the extra special touches she includes at her casita. She even noticed that I practice yoga and put a yoga mat in the place for us, then as we were leaving she came out and presented us with homemade brownies she baked after we arrived night before!
We are repeat visitors. Always a great experience with personal touches and wonderful accommodations. Angels goes out of her way to make everything right for us.

Angel is a very special host...thoughtful at every turn. Her place is quiet, immaculate, and she provides anything you need to make your stay better. She knows the area well and will give you whatever guidance or advice you want at a moment's notice. My husband hurt his knee on our travels and Angel borrowed crutches from a neighbor! You don't get much better than that!

Angel's Casita is very clean, neat and beautiful. We feel warm and welcome by Angel’s hospitality. She is very considerate of our needs and quickly helps with any requests we have. It is comfortable to stay at the Casita and we feel at home. We are also offered a tour of the scenic spots in the area. It's in a great location, peaceful and quite, also excellent for hiking and enjoying what Los Alamos can offer.
We really enjoyed staying at the Casita. It was the perfect spot for us. We can’t wait to come back and stay again!
Wonderful place for working and being close to everything. Amazing host. Cute house ! Excellent communication !
This was a perfect place to stay. We would recommend to anyone looking for a short or long stay in Los Alamos. Everything was great! Angel was a fantastic host. We will be back!
We had a fantastic stay at Angel's casita. Everything was perfect.

What an amazing little spot! Angel is a generously accommodating hostess with so many thoughtful gestures and amenities. The Casita is beautiful and immaculately clean. Very comfortable and pleasant to spend a lot of time in. We would definitely choose this again on a future trip to Los Alamos!
This is by far the best airbnb i have been in. There is everything in the kitchen and in the bathroom. Great place with a good access to LANL. Highly recomended
Wonderful hospitality and clean, relaxing accommodations. Couldn't be better.

This is the place to stay in Los Alamos! Close to Santa Fe, Bandalier, and the Jemez byway, amazing hospitality, super clean place, and absolutely superb New Mexican feeling space. LARGE bathroom, TONS of natural light, room to sleep the whole crew, laundry, great local suggestions and hospitality, and can I mention the cleanliness again?! We love how light and airy it felt and the view out of the windows is great. My daughter wants a house like it now. :)

We had a wonderful stay at the Casita. The location was a great base for visiting our friends and the parks in the area. We had all the pots and pans necessary to prepare our meals during our stay. Angel was a superb host, going above and beyond with lots of extras like the homemade cookies waiting for us as well as a refrigerator stocked with some everyday necessities like juice and dairy items, and common toiletries you might have forgotten like shampoo and soap. She and her family were very friendly, welcoming us when we arrived. I would definitely stay again.

Casita de Cielo is beyond expectations. It is superbly clean. The bed is most comfortable. The breakfast foods—fruit, cereal , oatmeal, English muffins, tea, coffee, juice and more, are a wonderful to start your day. It is very quiet and we feel very safe when staying here. Located on a canyon, the view is spectacular and wildlife such as deer can be scene walking behind the Casita. The kitchen is well equipped for any meal or snack you want to prepare. The bathroom has a spa feel and there is a washer and dryer, ironing board and iron, should you need to freshen your clothes. Angel goes the extra mile to welcome you and makes sure you have everything you need to make your stay comfortable. We make the Casita our priority when visiting our children in Los Alamos, if it is available. You won’t be disappointed!

We had a wonderful time at the Casita de Cielo! Angel was a superb host and went the extra mile to ensure we were comfortable during our stay. Five out of five stars and would definitely stay at Angels' place again. Beautiful views and a cozy atmosphere make you feel right at home.
Lovely place and gorgeous location!
Angel's place was amazing! Great views, hospitality, and perfect set up for a couple. We loved everything about this place and will definitely try to stay here again in the future.

Upon arrival at Casita de Ceilo, we were delighted to find that it was even more ideal than we’d expected. The home is comfortable, private, peaceful, and well-appointed. The best part: incredible views out the back windows of the canyon it’s situated above. We loved being serenaded by birdsong, and seeing deer meander by. Angel is a very welcoming host; she greeted us with warm cookies, and offered other goodies during our stay as well. The modern casita is well lit and its kitchen stocked with many essentials for brekkie and basic meal prep - much appreciated! Angel provided excellent suggestions about local restaurants and points of interest. We loved our stay here and highly recommend Angel’s place to others who travel to Los Alamos.

This was truly one of the nicest places that I've ever stayed at. From the beginning, communication with Angel was excellent and she was there to greet us with fresh homemade cookies when we arrived. The casita itself is spotless, cozy and inviting and it truly felt that Angel had tended to every detail. My family and I really appreciated that Angel provided coffee, tea and breakfast foods as well as extra towels, soap and anything else that we needed during our stay. It is a perfect place for families and groups to stay and is only a short drive away from the museums of Los Alamos, Bandelier National Monument and a wide variety of trails and interesting sites. My family and I had a wonderful time during our trip to New Mexico and it is largely thanks to Angel and her kindness and hospitality!

The Casita was sparkling clean, very homey, and located in a quiet neighborhood. It is also walking distance to many places in town, and to the national lab. I was here for three weeks, and it truly felt like home. Angel provided breakfast foods and snacks upon arrival. Angel was so kind and even made fresh baked goods! I would highly recommend staying here.
We felt very comfortable with all we needed in Angel’s casita, in a very nice canyon, forested area. Plus happy to be greeted by a local deer herd. Thank you.
Angel is a wonderful host, the house was perfect for a family of four. If your going to Los Alamos this is the place to stay!

Angel is a wonderful host. The Casita was sparkling clean and very comfortable. Angel had many welcoming touches, i.e., breakfast foods, cookie bars when we arrived, etc. We highly recommend staying at the Casita.
Excellent accommodations, extremely clean, and full of thoughtful touches. This place is fantastic!
Perfect stay! Angel and the house were great!
My wife and I had a great start to our honeymoon at Angel's casita. Spacious and cozy at the same time, with a good amount of space for cooking and relaxing.
Angel’s casita is so lovely, relaxing, and comfortable! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. When we visit Los Alamos again we will definitely stay here!

Wonderful home in Los Alamos! I was there to see a friend perform at the local arts center and it was the sweetest landing spot! Great view from the bedroom of a canyon with huge trees and a wilderness feel. Open living room/kitchen, super cozy bed, very clean, and Angel brought me a freshly backed, delicious cookie to enjoy on the sunny patio! I seriously could not have asked for a better experience.

Angel's casita is so great! Super clean, beautiful location with a stunning view of the mountains, great breakfast touches, helpful location suggestions, etc... Everything was great and I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Angel is a great host. Her place is very clean and stylish. It’s also in a beautiful location. We would love to come stay again :)
This is one of the most lovely places our family has every stayed!

Angel was an outstanding host. She was there to welcome us right when we arrived and gave us a short tour of the casita. Lots of amenities were provided including a folder full of tips about local restaurants, tourist spots and more. We had a wonderful time during our stay.
We will definitely be coming back!
Great place to stay with my husband and three kids!

La Casita is a lovely place, very well located, quiet, and with all the comfort required. Angel is the perfect hostess! Always available at any time and ready to help in any situation. Thanks Angel!!!!!

I stayed here for a month while working at the lab, and had a wonderful experience! Angel is so kind and treated me like a friend, not just a guest! The casita is so much nicer than the hotels in the area, and at a similar price, I definitely recommend!!

This was by far the best Airbnb we have ever stayed. Far exceeded expectations from past experiences. Angel was great. If every Airbnb met the standards of Angels place, hotels would become extinct. Angel made us feel extremely welcome, helped with parking issues from the snowstorm, and went the extra mile for having fresh fruit on the table and a refrigerator and drawers full of breakfast items. This is a fully furnished extremely clean rental unit. Angel is obviously very proud of what she has and does to keep it that way.
Amenities included everything a hotel would offer and then so much more. Hospitality was amazing.
The price was perfect; not too much, not too little. Angels place is truly the best of the best of all Airbnbs. Angel is the absolute perfect host and deserves to be recognized as such.
If you are staying in Los Alamos and looking for a quiet cozy place, give this Casita a try. Angel is a great host and very responsive.

We have stayed here twice now and both times were a great experience. The setting is peaceful and the lodging clean and well maintained. Our hosts were very generous and made us feel welcome and comfortable. I highly recommend this place to stay if you need to stay in Los Alamos but want to be in peaceful and quiet setting. We hope to come back during our next visit to Los Alamos.
Wonderful place to stay with the amenities its nice to have on the road. Clean, great host, and comfortable. Will stay here again, no doubt.
